title: Team of 2 Fullstack TypeScript Developers
description:
**Start****ASAP****Duration****4-6 months**
  
We are looking for two mid-level to senior developers who have previously worked together and know each other. You will be joining a gaming company’s central tech department and help them to deliver according to their roadmap.

**Start:** ASAP

**Length:** 6 months with possible extension

**Location:** Stockholm on-site minimum 2 days per week **(fully remote not possible)**

**Skills & Knowledge**

* TypeScript
* NestJS and Express
* AWS ECS
* RDS and DynamoDB

**Main Responsibilities**

* Collaborate effectively with existing team members to ensure project delivery.
* Implement features and enhancements using TypeScript and relevant frameworks.
* Maintain and optimize databases including RDS and DynamoDB.
* Deploy applications on AWS ECS.
* Contribute to the development of quality code and adherence to best practices.

**Key Requirements**

* Proficient in TypeScript.
* Experience with NestJS and Express frameworks.
* Knowledge of AWS ECS.
* Familiarity with RDS and DynamoDB.
* Strong problem-solving skills and a team-oriented mindset.

title: Embeddedutvecklare
description:
Sweden Software Stockholm Hybrid
TMC i Stockholm växer och vi söker fler Embeddedutvecklare till vårt team Digital & IT!

  


About The Member Company
We are a global high-tech consultancy company with a team of entrepreneurial engineers, scientists, and digital experts from around the world. Together we form a fast-growing and proud community. We offer consultancy services to high-profile clients globally in diverse service areas, such as:


* Technology & Engineering
* Energy & Renewables
* Life sciences & Pharma
* Digital & IT
**About this vacancy**
----------------------


På TMC blir du en del av en innovativ och entreprenöriell organisation där fokuset ligger på ständig utveckling och möjligheten att vara ansvarig för din egen utveckling och affär. I rollen som Embeddedutvecklare söker vi dig som är en engagerad lagspelare som vill vara med och utveckla system och produkter inom olika områden tillsammans med våra kunder runt om i StorStockholm. Dina arbetsuppgifter kan inkludera exempelvis; kravanalys, systemdesign, integration, testning, verifiering, felsökning, optimering, dokumentation och nära samarbete med andra ingenjörer.


**What we expect from you**
---------------------------


Som person är du noggrann och du behöver kunna omsätta idéer och koncept till praktiska och fungerande lösningar genom design, teknisk analys och samarbete med olika intressenter. Vi lägger stor vikt vid ditt personliga engagemang och din vilja att driva din utveckling framåt. Då man arbetar med ständiga förbättringar är detta något som du drivs av och tycker är intressant.


Krav för rollen är att du har:

* En akademisk ingenjörsexamen inom maskinteknik, elektronik, inbyggda system, datavetenskap eller liknande (Minst BSc, meriterande om MSc).
* Arbetat i minst 5 år med embeddedutveckling och integration av komplexa system
* Goda kunskaper inom systemarkitektur, testning, verifiering, C, C++ och Python
* Kunskaper i svenska och engelska obehindrat i tal och skrift


**What you can expect from us**
-------------------------------


I rollen som Employeneur får du både utveckla dina tekniska kunskaper och driva din egen utveckling och affär. Du blir del av en innovativ och entreprenöriell organisation där fokuset ligger på ständig utveckling och möjligheten att vara fullt ansvarig för att styra din egen karriär.

  

Vi lägger stor vikt vid ditt personliga engagemang och din vilja att driva din utveckling framåt. För att lyckas med det ges du chansen att själv påverka vilken typ av projekt du tar dig an samt vilken kompetensutveckling du vill investera i. Du styr din karriär helt enkelt.

  

Eftersom TMC är ett internationellt företag kan vi erbjuda projekt på olika platser i olika länder där vi och våra kunder finns. För närvarande finns vi representerade i Sverige, Nederländerna, Belgien, Frankrike, Tyskland, Luxemburg, Spanien, Portugal, Italien, Ungern, U.A.E., Mexiko, USA och Kanada. Du får världen som arbetsplats!


The 5 basic principles of **employeneurship**
A long-term working relationship
Enjoy the security of a long-term contract and a stable source of income while getting the opportunity to work at diverse projects.


Individual profit sharing
Full transparency. That’s it. For each of your projects, you know your hourly rate, your costs, and your individual performance-based profit sharing, all in order to stimulate your inner entrepreneur.


Business cells
Our employeneurs are grouped in business cells based on their technical expertise. They are small, focused and function as high-grade knowledge networks. And as buzzing communities of close colleagues.


YOUniversity
Every employeneur drives their own career. Together, we make a plan for personal and professional growth. Receive personal coaching and an extensive training budget to keep developing yourself and deliver outperformance at our clients.

  

The Entrepreneurial Lab
Work on your technical dreams in our lab. Collaborate with others in multidisciplinary teams to unlock out-of-the-box thinking and innovative ideas as well as entrepreneurial skills.
company_description: At TMC we believe it's people who drive technology. Our Employeneurship model creates the best conditions for technical talents to do so.

title: Senior systemutvecklare .NET
description:
**Soros Consulting söker senior systemutvecklare .NET till samhällskritisk kund**

Soros Consulting söker nu en erfaren **systemutvecklare inom .NET** till ett långsiktigt uppdrag hos en av våra kunder inom energi och infrastruktur. Kunden befinner sig i ett expansivt skede med stort fokus på digitalisering och säkerhet, där du kommer att spela en nyckelroll i utveckling, förvaltning och vidareutveckling av kritiska IT-system.Uppdraget löper över 12 månader med möjlighet till förlängning i 1 år till och är placerat i **Stockholm (Sundbyberg)** med möjlighet till visst distansarbete i samråd med kunden. Rollen kräver att du genomgår säkerhetsprövning innan uppdraget kan påbörjas.

**Om rollen**Du kommer att ingå i ett agilt team som arbetar med både nyutveckling och vidareutveckling av applikationer och system. Arbetet omfattar hela kedjan från krav till leverans och kan även innefatta test, dokumentation, felsökning samt samordning med andra intressenter.Systemen du arbetar med ställer höga krav på **IT- och informationssäkerhet**, vilket gör att intresse för systemarkitektur och säkra lösningar är starkt meriterande.

**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter**

* Design, implementation och test av systemlösningar i .NET-miljö
* Utveckling av REST API:er och gränssnitt mot databaser
* Hantering av incidenter, felsökning och buggrättning
* Dokumentation av krav, design och teknisk lösning
* Samarbete med teamet och andra avdelningar i organisationen
* Aktivt bidra till förbättringar inom systemarkitektur och utvecklingsmetodik

**Kvalifikationer – Skallkrav**För att vara aktuell för uppdraget krävs att du uppfyller följande:

* Högskole-/universitetsutbildning om minst 120p/180hp inom IT, eller YH-utbildning om minst 400 YH-poäng med inriktning på systemutveckling i .NET
* Minst **5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling med ASP.NET**
* Minst **5 års erfarenhet av utveckling i .NET Core**
* Minst **2 års erfarenhet av utveckling mot MS-SQL databaser**
* Minst **2 års erfarenhet av HTML, CSS och JavaScript**
* Minst **2 års erfarenhet av Entity Framework Core**
* Minst **1 års erfarenhet av att bygga REST API:er**
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift

**Meriterande – Börkrav (prisreducerande i utvärdering)**

* Minst **2 års erfarenhet av IT-arkitektur/design** av mjukvarusystem
* Deltagit i **minst två projekt med CI/CD pipelines i Azure DevOps**
* Minst **2 års erfarenhet av Git** som versionshanteringssystem
* Minst **2 års erfarenhet inom elmarknad och/eller kraftsystemområde**

**Övrigt**

* **Plats:** Stockholm (Sundbyberg) med möjlighet till visst remote-arbete
* **Omfattning:** 100%
* **Start:. Prel** 26 maj 2025 (kan justeras något beroende på säkerhetsprövning) Uppdraget kan inte påbörjas förrän denna är genomförd och kandidaten är godkänd

Vill du arbeta med teknik i framkant och bidra till digitaliseringen av ett samhällskritiskt uppdrag? Välkommen med din ansökan till Soros Consulting – vi rekryterar löpande.#SorosConsulting #ITjobb#systemutvecklare

Jobbtyp: Heltid

Arbetsort: På plats

Förväntat startdatum: 2025-05-26

title: Software Developer - Integrations @ Group IT
description:
At HMS Industrial Networks, we value the tremendous contributions of our employees, and we recognize that it is our people that make HMS successful. We work hard to maintain our vibrant, innovative, and welcoming culture, and we strive to support our staff as they grow and develop both personally and professionally.



We are currently seeking a **Software Developer** to join our **Group IT** team. We believe in fostering an inclusive and empowering workplace where every team member feels valued and supported. If you’re looking for an opportunity to contribute your skills while growing professionally, we’d love to hear from you!


### **ABOUT THE ROLE**



Are you an ambitious developer looking to take the next step in your career? As a **Software Developer** within **Group IT**, you’ll play a key role in designing and developing solutions that make a real impact across our organization.



You’ll work in a collaborative, agile environment with modern technologies and the freedom to take ownership of your work. While we’re a small, tight-knit team and always support each other, we value independent thinkers who are comfortable driving their own tasks forward.


##### **Your Key Responsibilities**


* **Application Development and Enhancement**. Develop and continuously improve software applications and frameworks.
* **Solution Implementation and Optimization**. Implement secure, scalable, and cost-efficient solutions aligned with best practices.
* **Technical Support and Ownership**. Maintain and support applications while bringing technical insight to the table.


You’ll collaborate with product owners and technical leads, while independently managing your tasks and contributing ideas that shape how we build software.



**Hybrid Work Model:** This role is based at our HQ in Halmstad, with the flexibility to work remotely approximately 50% of the time.


### **ABOUT YOU**



We’re looking for someone who’s eager to take initiative, enjoys solving problems, and is confident working both independently and collaboratively. You have a few years of hands-on experience and are ready to take more ownership in your next role.


##### **What You Bring:**



✅ Strong communication and teamwork skills.



✅ A proactive mindset and a willingness to take responsibility.



✅ Fluency in Swedish and English (written and spoken).



✅ Experience working in agile development environments.



✅ A couple of years of experience (typically 2–4 years) in software development, with knowledge in:


* .NET
* MS Azure tech stack (e.g., Azure Functions, Logic Apps, Azure Storage)
* YAML and T-SQL
* SQL-related programming and relational databases

##### **Nice to Have:**


* Experience with Microsoft Dynamics 365 and Power Platform.
* Familiarity with DevOps tools (e.g., ADO Pipelines, CI/CD).
* Relevant Microsoft Azure certifications.

### **ABOUT US**



At HMS, we believe that connecting matters in everything from making machines talk to engaging with our customers. Our state-of-the-art technology provides a fast and easy way to network millions of industrial devices all over the world. From factory automation to connected buildings, remote solutions, and future technologies, we provide innovative solutions that save you time and money creating a more productive and sustainable world. HMS stands for Hardware Meets Software ™.



HMS is a truly international company, and we like to think that we share a common culture. Heart, Mind and Soul is a summary of how we do things (makes for a pretty good abbreviation too).



Welcome to HMS, this is HMS!



### **ABOUT THE APPLICATION**



HMS is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.



Join us in pushing the boundaries of technology and making a significant impact in the industry. Apply today and be part of a team that values your unique perspective and expertise!



The selection process will be conducted ongoing, so do not wait to submit your application.



If you want to know more about the role, please contact Product Owner Lisa Rosén liro@hms.se, if you want to know more about the recruitment process, please contact responsible HR.



Welcome with your application!
company_description: HMS is Moving Healthcare Forward

title: Cobol Developer for Core Custody Clearing & Settlement \u007C SEB, Solna
description:
Do you want to work with developing and managing some of SEB's core systems for securities? Do you have experience with Cobol, DB2 and Mainframe? We are now looking for someone who wants to work with COBOL programming but also contribute to the modernization of the mainframe for Core Custody within Retail & Wealth area.
**About the job**
SEB is currently in the middle of our digital transformation and where we need your help to shape the bank's future. Our mainframe systems are important to be able to enable speed and quality in IT delivery for large parts of our business areas. As a COBOL developer with us, you are responsible for developing and managing solutions in accordance with requirements, strategies and architecture.  

You will be part of a team of 8 people who work with the development and management of the systems that we are responsible for within the Clearing & Settlement area of Custody. We work closely with the business, where the customers' needs and wishes are in focus. Within the team, you will be responsible for systems that handle settlement of securities transactions, internal and external moves, as well as static data on markets and custodian banks.  

At SEB, SAFe is used in an inspired way of working, which means that colleagues from tech, business and business operations work closely together and that we have organized ourselves into tribes and ART's. In the business-related teams, there is a great commitment and ambition to collaborate with each other to create the best solutions. **Who are you?**
To thrive and succeed in your role with us, you are customer- and business-oriented and enjoy working in a team. You are committed and work in a structured way with a good delivery ability. As a person, you are driven, innovative and have a changing mindset to add greater customer value. You are positive and clear in your communication and are happy to share your knowledge.
### **We believe you have**

* Extensive experience on development in Mainframe/zOS, it’s extra meritorious if you have Hands on experience with SEB’s modern development environments such as IDz, SEBz, VS-Code and SUI.
* Extensive experience in Cobol programming and DB2.
* Experience of JCL-construction.
* Experience from banking and finance and securities is meritorious.
* Appreciate that we work agile, it is extra meritorious if you work according to SAFe
* Good skills in both speaking and writing in English.

**Read more about what it's like to work at SEB** **www.sebgroup.com/career**
At SEB, we are convinced that inclusion and diversity are crucial to building strong and good teams and for our company to be sustainable for the future. We strive to have an inclusive and values-driven culture where we all feel valued, respected and involved regardless of background, experience, faith, gender, age or where we come from. **Welcome with your application!** Attach your CV and a cover letter in which you describe yourself and what you can contribute to SEB.
We handle the selection and interviews on an ongoing basis. If you have questions about the role, please contact Malena Langley, Team Manager for Clearing & Settlement at malena.langley@seb.se
company_description: More than 15.000 people work at SEB. Working in SEB means being part of an exciting journey, driven by digital transformation

title: Android App Developer
description:
### **Assignment Description**


* Design and develop navigation applications on Android OS.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product and UI/UX design teams to define application features.
* Identify potential problems and resolve application bottlenecks for performance optimizations.
* Triage, debug, and fix application issues before final release.
* Perform code reviews and practice continuous integration and development.
* Write test code to test for quality, robustness, and functional correctness, including edge cases.
* Design and implement subsequent application updates and releases.
* Grow your skills with continual learning, workshops, conferences, and talks.


**Requirements**


* Proven Android app developer with 5+ years of experience.
* Proficiency in Kotlin, Java, and C++.
* Proficiency in using Android and Android Jetpack APIs, including knowledge of Android NDK and JNI.
* Knowledge and experience with Jetpack libraries.
* Knowledge of Android design principles and application interface guidelines.
* Knowledge of Android’s performance and testing framework.
* Familiarity with embedded Android framework services.
* Excellent coding and proofreading skills.
* Familiarity with the best-in-class Software development practices.
* Proficient in code versioning tools including Git, Bitbucket and others.
* Experience with continuous integration tools, such as Jenkins.
* Ability to manage your workload with minimal supervision.
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or Software Engineering (M.Sc. preferred).
* Excellent inter-personal skills with the ability to collaboratively work with and influence cross-functional teams.

title: Engineering Manager - Platform Team (Developer Experience)
description:
**Start****ASAP****Duration****7-9 months**
  
We’re looking for an experienced Engineering Manager to step in and lead a Platform team focused on Developer Experience

**Start: ASAP**

**Duration: 9 months**

**Location: Stockholm/hybrid setup**

**What you will do**


Lead the platform team in building tools, services, and processes that make developers faster, happier, and more productive. Your goal is to enable engineering teams to ship with confidence and speed.

**Your Responsibilities:**

* Lead and coach a cross-functional platform team
* Drive initiatives around monitoring, logging, and system resilience
* Own and evolve the Developer Center – manuals, guides, and blueprints for how to build
* Oversee shared libraries and tools used across the engineering org
* Streamline and scale the onboarding experience for developers
* Collaborate across teams to ensure shared services meet the needs of product teams

**What you bring**

* Proven track record as an Engineering Manager or Tech Lead with leadership experience
* Strong understanding of platform engineering and developer enablement
* Familiarity with ecosystems like Java, React, and TypeScript
* Experience building for observability, reliability, and developer self-service
* A passion for creating intuitive, scalable internal tools

**Tech & Ecosystem**

* Languages/Frameworks: Java, React, TypeScript
* Domain: Developer Experience, Platform Engineering
* Focus Areas: Onboarding, Monitoring, Logging, Resilience, Shared Services

title: Software Developer Intern for TUI Airline Technology
description:
Stockholm, SWE Hybrid Internship Full Time 39 132629
Are you pursuing a Bachelor’s degree or Master’s degree in Sweden? Are you passionate about travelling and eager to explore how innovative technologies can revolutionize the user experience, while seeking an opportunity to apply your academic knowledge in a practical setting?

  

Now you have an amazing opportunity to join our TUI Group Airline Technology community as an intern working on one of our development projects. Our Team, the Engineering & Maintenance team, is an international team with colleagues from Sweden, Germany, Spain and the UK. You will be working mainly with our Swedish and Spanish colleagues who are very experienced Software Engineers, and they will be guiding you through your time with us.

  

We will provide you with knowledge sharing and the tools you need to confidently work on the project. We are working with C# (.net), Javascript (vue), SLQ (Postgres), AWS, and Code repository (GIT), as a GUI we are using Visual Studio and Visual Studio Code.

  

After a successful onboarding and introduction to our department and TUI we have made a Learning & Development Plan for you. Ensuring your will get the most out of your internship period with us.


**Your task could include, but will not be limited to:**

* Deliver and produce functional IT solutions to our business together with your team.
* Maintain and improve solutions already delivered.
* Be part in the solution-architecture of the systems/service your team build.
* Engage with product owners to understand their requirements and to help solve their challenges.
* Demonstrate to Product owners and users what we deliver and keep them informed about progress, and help them understand the different complexity of issues.
* Be part of the daily and weekly meetings with the team.

 **Qualifications**

* You are currently enrolled in a Bachelor’s degree or Master’s degree in Sweden.
* Language skills Swedish and English, a plus (not a need) if you also knows Spanish.
* You are able to start your internship from the autumn period 2025 accordingly to your internship period at your university.
* We seek Interns who are eager to learn.
* Knowledge in C# and/or Vue.

**Why apply for an internship at TUI?**  

We offer you an internship where you’ll be working right at the heart of our business – with real responsibilities, and the chance to work on real projects. You’ll gain a unique insight into our exciting and dynamic industry, with exposure to many other functional areas and senior colleagues, as well as the opportunity to enhance your professional skills through our on-hands approach. You’ll have lots of fun during your time with us, and we’ll ensure you get the support you need every step of the way.


We would love your feedback and input! We know that our new Intern is very valuable for us and brings new knowledge and approaches to the table. We can learn a lot from that. That’s why we have allocated time both in the beginning and at the end of your internship period to bring your recommendations and advice to us.

 **Who are we?**  

TUI Group is the world’s number one integrated tourism business with more than 65.000 colleagues globally. As an Intern for TUI in the Nordics you will be a part of our Nordic organization.

  

At TUI we say Let’s TUI it. For us, that means creating smiles every day. We have a can-do attitude, to find solutions and tackle every day together. So, whether we’re dreaming up new ways to make our customers happier, or connecting with our colleagues, we’re creating a culture that’s as positive as the experiences we offer.

 **We’re adventure seekers. Smile givers. Impact makers. We’re TUI.**

 **Note: This is an unpaid internship for students currently enrolled in a university or a vocational university in Sweden.**

title: FRA söker scrummaster och kreativ mjukvaruutvecklare
description:
*Vill du göra samhällsnytta och bidra till Sveriges oberoende i världen? FRA söker nu en kreativ systemutvecklare med stort teknikintresse. Är du den vi söker kan vi erbjuda ett varierande arbete i en kunskapsintensiv verksamhet där du får vara med och göra skillnad varje dag. På FRA arbetar vi med unika uppgifter – för Sveriges säkerhet och integritet.*

**Om FRA**  

Omvärlden är FRA:s arena. Vår uppgift som underrättelsetjänst är att skydda Sverige mot de allvarligaste hot som kan riktas mot ett samhälle – militära angrepp, terrorism och cyberattacker. Vi skyddar det viktigaste vi har – vår trygghet, vår demokrati och vårt sätt att leva. Genom vår kunskap om omvärlden kan vårt land förbereda sig och möta hoten i tid. Vi är experter på cyberområdet och signalspaning och en larmklocka för militära hot. Vi är också i kärnan av det svenska cyberförsvaret och skyddar de viktigaste verksamheterna och den viktigaste infrastrukturen från angrepp. För att klara våra kärnuppdrag krävs avancerade tekniklösningar. Tillsammans har vi en unik uppgift, som vi löser med hjälp av vår kunskap och kompetens.


För din trygghet. För vår demokrati. Varje dag. Året om.

**Ditt uppdrag**  

Som systemutvecklare hör du till avdelningen för Teknik. Avdelningen har till uppgift att förse FRA med de tekniska system som behövs för verksamheten. Avdelningen utvecklar, anskaffar och driftsätter nya system samt sköter drift och underhåll av befintliga system.


Arbetsuppgifterna innebär att du kombinerar dina tekniska kunskaper med din analytiska förmåga. Utvecklingen går fort och du kommer att arbeta inom flera olika områden. Tillsammans med dina medarbetare kommer du att vidareutveckla teknisk metodik och verktyg för att hitta nya sätt att ta utveckla verksamheten. Detta är en förutsättning för att ta sig an morgondagens utmaningar.


Den här rollen är uppdelad vilket gör att du arbetar ungefär 20 % som scrummaster och 80 % som systemutvecklare. Som SM är det din uppgift att leda och utveckla det agila arbetet. Vi arbetar enligt SAFe-modellen, så du kommer arbeta nära Leveransledare, och regelbundet även träffa andra SMs för att utbyta erfarenheter.
  

Som systemutvecklare kommer du arbeta med den senaste tekniken. Teamet är krossfunktionellt och man jobbar ungefär lika mycket med frontend som backend, så för den som vill finns goda möjligheter att bredda sin kompetens. Teamet medverkar i alla faser av systemens livscykel; från kravinsamling, systemdesign, drift, förvaltning och avveckling. Arbetet sker i nära samarbete med beställare och interna användare inom cyberområdet.

**Du kan**  

Vi söker dig som har:

* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom Systemvetenskap, Civilingenjör/Högskoleingenjör eller annan IT-inriktad utbildning så som yrkeshögskola. Alternativt har du erhållit motsvarande kunskap genom arbetslivserfarenhet
* Arbetat som utvecklare i ett utvecklingsteam i minst 5 år
* Arbetat som scrummaster för ett utvecklingsteam i minst 1 år
* Arbetat med Jira, Confluence och github som scrummaster/systemutvecklare
* Erfarenhet av Python i Linuxmiljöer
* Erfarenhet av objektorienterad programmering t ex Java
* God förmåga att kommunicera på svenska och engelska i såväl tal som skrift


Vi ser det som meriterande om du har följande erfarenhet:

* Kurser, utbildningar eller certifieringar inom IT-området
* Containerbaserad mjukvaruutveckling
* Arbetat i virtuella miljöer
* Arbetat med React, Typescript, CSS
* Arbetat med ElasticSearch, Postgres, Grafana och Prometheus
* B-körkort


Tekniska tester kommer appliceras under rekryteringsprocessens gång.

**Du är**  

Vi kommer att lägga stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper och söker dig som utvecklar effektiva, förnuftiga och genomförbara lösningar på problem. Du tar snabbt tar in ny kunskap som du tillsammans med din erfarenhet använder på ett flexibelt sätt. Vi ser att du är en strukturerad person som har förmågan att ta fram lång - och kortsiktiga planer utifrån gruppens mål och deadlines. Du trivs med att driva arbetet framåt där du även duktig på att ta hänsyn till efterfrågan samt gruppens förutsättningar och resurser. Rollen är koordinerande och vi ser därför att du har lätt för samarbete samt är tydlig och lyhörd i din kommunikation.

**Mer information**  

Arbetsplatsen är belägen i närheten av Drottningholm, ca 10 min med buss från Brommaplan. Svenskt medborgarskap är ett krav då anställning vid FRA innebär placering i säkerhetsklass. Ett krav för att få anställning är godkänd säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll. Säkerhetsprövningen kommer att genomföras i enlighet med bestämmelser i säkerhetsskyddslagen. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. Vi tillämpar sex månaders provanställning. För mer information är du välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef på 010-557 47 98samt fackliga företrädare på


010-557 46 00.


Vi tar emot ansökningar via www.fra.se **senast 2025-05-04.**
  

Referensnummer **2025FRA138**


Då vi inför denna rekrytering redan tagit ställning till de rekryteringskanaler vi önskar använda undanber vi oss att bli kontaktade för ytterligare erbjudanden om annonserings- och rekryteringshjälp.


  
### **Län:**


* Stockholm

Tillsvidareanställning

title: Full-Stack Developer – Axis365 Team
description:
Job Title
Full-Stack Developer – Axis365 Team
Job Description*Are you passionate about working with cutting-edge technologies and collaborating with skilled professionals in a global, leading company? If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you! We are currently looking for a Full-Stack Developer to join our* *Axis365 Team* *in the* *Information Systems.*
Your future team
Our Axis365 Team is a part of the Collaboration Platforms unit within the Information Systems Department. We are on an exciting journey to enhance our usage of the Microsoft 365 platform to meet the evolving needs of Axis Communications. As a small but dynamic team, we work closely with all departments, delivering tailored solutions that optimize collaboration across the company. We are responsible for maintaining and evolving the Microsoft 365 ecosystem at Axis, focusing on improving workflows, automation, and enhancing the overall digital experience. The team works in an innovative, agile environment, and you will have the opportunity to shape the future of collaboration within our organization.
Your role as a Full-Stack Developer
We are seeking an experienced and highly collaborative Full-Stack Developer to join our team. As a solutions expert within our company, you will work on innovative projects that enhance user collaboration across the organization, focusing on React TypeScript, C#, SharePoint Framework (SPFx), and Microsoft 365 environments.
Key Responsibilities* Develop and maintain web applications using React and TypeScript in the M365 ecosystem.
* Implement SharePoint Framework (SPFx) solutions, including web parts and extensions.
* Integrate and maintain backend services, both on premises and in Azure using C# and PowerShell.
* Work with various Azure services to design cloud solutions that fit the company’s needs.
* Support and maintain applications in a Microsoft 365 environment, including SharePoint and Teams.
* Collaborate in an Agile team environment, participating in daily standups, sprint planning, and reviews.
* Act as a key collaborator between IT and business teams to drive best practices in productivity and collaboration.
* Troubleshoot and resolve issues in both front-end and back-end code.
* Participate in code reviews, design reviews, and contribute to technical architecture decisions.


This role is based on-site, where you will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams and key stakeholders to deliver robust, scalable solutions.
Who are you?
We think that you have 3+ years of experience in full-stack development, with a focus on React and TypeScript. Proficiency in C# and experience with backend systems using the .NET framework. You have strong hands-on experience with SharePoint Online, SharePoint Framework (SPFx), and M365. You have an understanding of Azure services (e.g., Functions, Entra ID) for cloud-based solutions. We think that you have experience working in a collaborative environment, actively sharing ideas and solutions with team members. You have the ability to work on-site and collaborate with various teams and stakeholders effectively.
We love for you to be:* Familiarity with DevOps practices in Azure.
* Knowledge of Power Platform (Power Automate, Power Apps) is a plus.


What Axis has to offer  

By joining Axis, you will embark on an exciting journey of personal and professional growth. We will offer you a great introduction to Axis with training. Our team will support you, but also listen to your experiences and give you freedom to explore and realize your ideas. We are a fast-growing company that can offer you great career opportunities and a competitive package of benefits.
In exchange for your dedication, Axis offers you a job in an open, friendly, and professional environment. We work in an innovative and global organization that takes great pride in delivering world-class, high-quality products, services, and solutions to our customers. Working with us gives you an excellent opportunity to develop in an organization promoting professional and individual growth. You will have a role where your operational effort really will be of great impact to the overall success of Axis.
We want you to enjoy working with us, which is why we offer benefits such as flexible working hours, morning “fika” every day, Friday cake, company bonus, wellness allowance, health insurance and your very own Axis bicycle - to name a few.
We also provide a brand new training facility free for every Axis employee.
You can see it here Axis HQ  

We believe in sustainability, equality and inclusion
Read more here
Axis is an organization that values creativity and promotes teamwork and openness. With us you will grow both personally and professionally. You will be part of a team of great colleagues that enjoy going to work in the morning. Welcome!
Curious to discover more?  

We have a host of places where you can learn more about Axis, our products, solutions, company culture, and what working at Axis is really like.  

  

Check out:
Life at Axis blog  

Engineering at Axis blog  

Innovation at Axis
Ready to Act?
Axis is a company realizing the benefits of a diverse workforce. We know that diversity in groups creates a better working environment and promotes creativity, something that is fundamental for our success. We welcome all applications.  

We go through applications continuously so don’t wait – send in your application today!  

  

If you have any questions, please reach out to recruiting manager Halldór Hreimsson, Manager Collaboration Platforms email: halldor.hreimsson@axis.com
Type of Employment
Permanent Employment
Posting End Date
2025-04-28*Certain roles at Axis require background checks, which means applicable verifications will be done in these recruitments.* *Notice will be provided before we take any action.*
About Axis Communications
We enable a smarter, safer world by creating innovative solutions for improving security and business performance. As a network technology company and industry leader, we offer solutions in video surveillance, access control, intercom, and audio systems, enhanced by intelligent analytics applications.
With around 5000 committed employees in over 50 countries, we collaborate with partners worldwide. Together, we thrive in our friendly, open, and collaborative culture and inspire each other to think beyond the expected. United by our commitment to inclusion, diversity, and sustainability, we consistently seek to develop our skills and way of working.
Let´s create a smarter, safer world
For more information about Axis, please visit our website www.axis.com.
Listen to Get To Know Axis – Podcast

title: ServiceNow Developer
description:
Job Title
ServiceNow Developer
Job Description*Are you passionate about streamlining processes, building innovative solutions, and working with world-class professionals at a leading global company? If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you! We are currently looking for a* *ServiceNow Developer* *to join our* *ServiceNow Team* *in the Information Systems Department at Axis in Lund.*
Your future team  

Our ServiceNow Team is a part of the Collaboration Platforms unit within the Information Systems Department. We are on an exciting journey to elevate our ServiceNow platform to meet the evolving needs of Axis Communications. As a highly collaborative and agile team, we partner closely with all departments to design and implement solutions that improve efficiency, automate workflows, and optimize service delivery across the company. We are responsible for maintaining and evolving the ServiceNow ecosystem, focusing on enhancing operational workflows and improving user experience. The team works in a forward-thinking, innovative environment, giving you the opportunity to influence the future of service delivery within our organization.
Your role as a ServiceNow Developer  

As a ServiceNow Developer, you will play a pivotal role in designing, developing, and maintaining solutions within the ServiceNow platform. You will work on system architecture, developing custom applications, automating processes, and integrating the platform with other business systems. Collaboration and knowledge sharing are integral to this role, as you will help drive the platform's evolution to ensure it remains scalable, secure, and aligned with Axis’ long-term strategy. In addition, you will play a key role in translating business requirements into technical solutions, working closely with stakeholders to ensure that our ServiceNow implementation meets the highest standards of performance and usability.
Key Responsibilities* Develop, maintain, and enhance ServiceNow platform capabilities, including ITSM, CSM, and custom applications.
* Architect and implement workflows, automation, and integration between ServiceNow and other enterprise systems.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
* Ensure the security, performance, and availability of the ServiceNow platform.
* Contribute to team growth through knowledge sharing, best practices, and continuous improvements.


Who are we looking for  

We are seeking a skilled developer who thrives in a collaborative environment and enjoys solving complex problems. You should have solid experience with the ServiceNow platform and a passion for improving business processes through automation and innovation. Your solutions will need to meet high standards of scalability, security, and performance.
We’d love to hear that you have:* A university degree in computer science, systems science, or a related field.
* Proven experience developing on the ServiceNow platform, including ITSM, CSM, or other modules.
* Strong knowledge of JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and web technologies used in ServiceNow development.


Bonus points if you have:* Experience with ServiceNow certifications (Certified System Administrator, Certified Application Developer).
* Knowledge of ServiceNow HRSD and ITOM modules.
* Experience with Flow Designer, ServiceNow Studio, and integrations with third-party systems.


What Axis has to offer  

By joining Axis, you will embark on an exciting journey of personal and professional growth. We will offer you a great introduction to Axis with training. Our team will support you, but also listen to your experiences and give you freedom to explore and realize your ideas. We are a fast-growing company that can offer you great career opportunities and a competitive package of benefits.
In exchange for your dedication, Axis offers you a job in an open, friendly, and professional environment. We work in an innovative and global organization that takes great pride in delivering world-class, high-quality products, services, and solutions to our customers. Working with us gives you an excellent opportunity to develop in an organization promoting professional and individual growth. You will have a role where your operational effort really will be of great impact to the overall success of Axis.
We want you to enjoy working with us, which is why we offer benefits such as flexible working hours, morning “fika” every day, Friday cake, company bonus, wellness allowance, health insurance and your very own Axis bicycle - to name a few.
We also provide a brand new training facility free for every Axis employee.
You can see it here Axis HQ  

We believe in sustainability, equality and inclusion
Read more here  

Axis is an organization that values creativity and promotes teamwork and openness. With us you will grow both personally and professionally. You will be part of a team of great colleagues that enjoy going to work in the morning. Welcome!
Curious to discover more?  

We have a host of places where you can learn more about Axis, our products, solutions, company culture, and what working at Axis is really like.  

  

Check out:
Life at Axis blog  

Engineering at Axis blog  

Innovation at Axis
Ready to Act?
Axis is a company realizing the benefits of a diverse workforce. We know that diversity in groups creates a better working environment and promotes creativity, something that is fundamental for our success. We welcome all applications.
We go through applications continuously so don’t wait – send in your application today!  

  

If you have any questions, please reach out to recruiting manager Halldór Hreimsson, Manager Collaboration Platforms email: halldor.hreimsson@axis.com

title: Software Developer
description:
#### **Stellenbeschreibung**

**Who We Are**  

At Rapid Data, we are the market leader in software solutions for the funeral industry across Europe. But we’re not stopping there. Through continuous innovation and expansion, our mission is to build the most advanced, scalable, and efficient technology platform—empowering businesses and customers worldwide.  

Our teams provide web-based services to the funeral sector in Sweden and Norway. With 48 employees in the Nordics and a total of 160 across the group, we are growing rapidly.  

Our core mission? To simplify and enhance everyday operations for funeral homes and the families they serve.  

  

**Why Join Us?**  

At Rapid Data, you’ll be part of a friendly, inclusive, and high-performing team. We believe in collaboration, celebrate our successes, and foster a creative, professional work environment.  

  

We offer:  

✔ A modern office space in Örebro (with flexible remote work options)  

✔ Competitive benefits, including generous wellness allowances  

✔ A culture of continuous learning, innovation, and professional growth  

✔ Opportunities to contribute to products that make a real impact  

  

Beyond work, we value team-building activities, knowledge-sharing sessions, and exciting conferences. As we expand and innovate, there’s no better time to join us!

#### **Your tasks:**


As a developer at Rapid Data in Örebro, you’ll play a crucial role in shaping the future of our products. You will be a part of the engineering team in the nordics with over 20 members and primarily working with the ERP team consisting of five other talented individuals. You will be working closely together to develop:  

* **Bitnet ERP** – A powerful business management system used by funeral homes in Sweden and Norway.
* **Min Gåva** – A donation platform used by over 2000+ charities.
* Various **web-based services** that enhance efficiency and streamline workflows for our clients.


  

We are dedicated to staying at the forefront of technology, and every team member’s contribution is essential in driving our vision forward.  

**Various tech stacks we work with:*** Vue, React
* Play Framework, Java Servlets, .NET Core
* MySQL, PostgreSQL

#### **Your skillset:**


We’re looking for a passionate developer who thrives in a fast-paced, innovative environment. You enjoy problem-solving, taking initiatives, and are eager to make a difference.  

  

**Your skills & experience:**  

✅ Experience with web-based system development (both frontend and backend)  

✅ Quick to learn and adapt to new technologies  

✅ Relevant academic background or practical experience in software development, such as computer science, information systems, or engineering.  

We’re looking for someone who is a proactive and independent thinker that also thrives in a collaborative environment. You understand what makes a great product and take ownership of your work while staying open to feedback and new ideas. With an ambitious and adaptable mindset, you’re always looking for ways to improve both the product and yourself.  

  

**Interested? Let’s Talk!**  

Sounds exciting? Want to know more? Get in touch with us today—we’d love to hear from you!

#### **About us**


Rapid Data is a leading software provider for the funeral industry in Europe and has been synonymous with innovation and progress since 1989. It is our passion to develop state-of-the-art ERP and CRM solutions that revolutionize the way funeral service providers work.


We are more than just a company – we are pioneers of change and stand at the forefront to lead the industry into a new era. Our goal is not only to be present in Europe but to establish a global presence, supporting every funeral service provider and their partners with our all-in-one technology platform.


Driven by our vision and supported by one of the most demanding and renowned private equity investors in the world, we are in a phase of accelerated growth. Every day is a new opportunity for us to push our boundaries and realize our dreams. We are ready to change the world – be part of this exciting journey with Rapid Data.

description:

**Kontaktperson**Frida Magnusson

**Facklig företrädare**Fackliga representanter

**Övrigt**
----------


Tipsa en vän Skriv ut
Spara som favorit


Vad är delningsknappar? Dela på Twitter Dela på LinkedIn Dela på Google Dela på Facebook Dela på Digg


**Om arbetsplatsen**
--------------------

Enköpings kommun är arbetsplatsen för dig som vill vara med och skapa det långsiktigt goda samhället. Här får du möjlighet till personlig utveckling samtidigt som du får chansen att göra verklig skillnad för alla som lever och verkar i Enköping. Vi förutsätter att du är kompetent, vetgirig och redo att axla ett stort ansvar. Vilka goda idéer vill du vara med och förverkliga?  

  

Vill du veta mer om oss som arbetsgivare? Titta in på vår jobbsida: https://enkoping.se/jobb  

  

Var med och skapa framtidens Enköping!  

  

Enköpings kommun är arbetsplatsen för dig som vill bidra till det långsiktigt goda samhället. Här får du möjligheten att utvecklas både professionellt och personligt, samtidigt som du gör verklig skillnad för alla som lever och verkar i Enköping. Vi söker dig som är kompetent, nyfiken och redo att ta ansvar. Vilka goda idéer vill du vara med och förverkliga?  

  

På Teknik- och serviceförvaltningen i Enköpings kommun arbetar vi för att skapa en hållbar och väl fungerande vardag för Enköpingsborna – både idag och i framtiden. Med ansvar för fastigheter, allmän plats, VA, måltidsservice och servicefunktioner är vi en nyckelspelare i kommunens utveckling. Hos oss får du möjlighet att påverka, samarbeta och bidra till att nå en hållbarare och attraktiv kommun. Vi söker engagerade medarbetare som vill vara med och förverkliga goda idéer – är du en av dem?  

  

I din nya roll blir du en del av förvaltningens verksamhetsstöd som arbetar på staben. Här har vi olika spetskompetenser men arbetar tillsammans som ett team.  

  

Vi i Enköpings kommun tycker hälsa är viktigt och därmed erbjuder ett friskvårdsbidrag.


**Arbetsuppgifter**
-------------------

Vi söker dig som har flera års erfarenhet av backendutveckling och som trivs med att utveckla och implementera lösningar som kopplar samman olika system och tjänster. Som person är du självgående, analytisk och lösningsorienterad med en förmåga att arbeta strukturerat. Din starka samarbetsförmåga och goda kommunikationsförmåga gör att du bidrar effektivt i team. Du är flexibel och öppen för att lära dig nya teknologier och arbetsmetoder, samtidigt som du är självgående och proaktiv med en stark känsla för kvalitet och detaljer. Du har förmågan att leda dig själv mot uppsatta mål och strukturera ditt vardagliga jobb. Hos oss blir du en viktig del av vårt utvecklingsarbete där du kommer att både ta fram och implementera lösningar i projektform. Därför vill vi att du har erfarenhet av projektledning och projektmetodik.  

  

Som kollega hos oss kommer du att arbeta med:  

  

* Utveckla och driva implementation av tekniska lösningar/system/digitala arbetssätt utifrån projektdirektiv, aktiviteter eller en behovsbild.
* Utveckla och underhålla skalbara och robusta backend-lösningar utifrån behovsbild och aktuella projektdirektiv.
* Ansvar för att utforma IT-arkitektur och systemarkitektur utifrån beslutade effektmål och förvaltningsplaner EM3.
* Säkerställa smidiga integrationer och API:er mellan våra verksamhetssystem och externa system.
* Samarbeta med vår IT-driftleverantör för att säkerställa en integrerad och högkvalitativ IT-miljö
* Upphandling av IT-system samt implementering av dessa i verksamheterna.
* Säkerställa krav och lagar kopplade till cybersäkerhet för respektive verksamhetsområde.
* Avveckling/utfasning av IT-system och applikationer.

  

Tjänsten är en projektanställning som pågår under ett år.
**Kvalifikationer**
-------------------

* En relevant högskoleutbildning inom datavetenskap, informationsteknologi eller motsvarande.

  

* Erfarenhet av att utveckla API:er och backendtjänster.

  

* Erfarenhet av att bygga integrationer som kopplar ihop olika digitala system, inklusive fastighetsstyrning och IoT-lösningar.

  

* Erfarenhet av att leda och driva projekt självständigt.

  

* Förmåga att kommunicera effektivt på svenska i både tal och skrift.
**Anställningens omfattning**
-----------------------------

Tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse. Rekryteringsprocessen pågår under annonseringstiden och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista annonseringsdatum.


**Ansökan**
-----------


Referensnummer: C245306

  



**Övrigt**
----------

Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!  

  

För att kvalitetssäkra rekryteringsprocessen samt möjliggöra god kommunikation med våra sökande ber vi dig skicka in din ansökan digitalt via länken för ansökan.  

  

Dina ansökningshandlingar omfattas av offentlighetsprincipen och kan därför komma att lämnas ut som allmän handling efter en sekretessprövning. Vill du veta mer om hur Enköpings kommun generellt sett hanterar personuppgifter så finns mer information på vår hemsida.  

  

För dig som har skyddad identitet så finns information om hur du söker tjänsten via länken nedan och under rubriken "hantering av personuppgifter"  

  

https://enkoping.se/foretag-och-arbete/jobba-i-enkoping/kommunen-som-arbetsgivare.html  

  

Vi undanber oss alla erbjudanden om annonserings- och rekryteringshjälp i samband med denna annons.

Bli en del en av vrldens strsta leverantrer av IT- och affrskonsulttjnster.
