title: Backend Developer • Product Library
company_industry: Software Development, Financial Services, and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
**The Company**
 PayPal has been revolutionizing commerce globally for more than 25 years. Creating innovative experiences that make moving money, selling, and shopping simple, personalized, and secure, PayPal empowers consumers and businesses in approximately 200 markets to join and thrive in the global economy.
   

  

 We operate a global, two-sided network at scale that connects hundreds of millions of merchants and consumers. We help merchants and consumers connect, transact, and complete payments, whether they are online or in person. PayPal is more than a connection to third-party payment networks. We provide proprietary payment solutions accepted by merchants that enable the completion of payments on our platform on behalf of our customers.
   

  

 We offer our customers the flexibility to use their accounts to purchase and receive payments for goods and services, as well as the ability to transfer and withdraw funds. We enable consumers to exchange funds more safely with merchants using a variety of funding sources, which may include a bank account, a PayPal or Venmo account balance, PayPal and Venmo branded credit products, a credit card, a debit card, certain cryptocurrencies, or other stored value products such as gift cards, and eligible credit card rewards. Our PayPal, Venmo, and Xoom products also make it safer and simpler for friends and family to transfer funds to each other. We offer merchants an end-to-end payments solution that provides authorization and settlement capabilities, as well as instant access to funds and payouts. We also help merchants connect with their customers, process exchanges and returns, and manage risk. We enable consumers to engage in cross-border shopping and merchants to extend their global reach while reducing the complexity and friction involved in enabling cross-border trade.
   

  

 Our beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We live each day guided by our core values of Inclusion, Innovation, Collaboration, and Wellness. Together, our values ensure that we work together as one global team with our customers at the center of everything we do – and they push us to ensure we take care of ourselves, each other, and our communities.
   

  

**Job Description Summary:**
 As PayPal continues its mission to revolutionize commerce, we are on the lookout for a passionate Backend Developer to join one of our teams at the forefront of shaping innovative solutions and crafting modern products that positively impact our merchants' lives. Curious to learn more? Keep scrolling!
   

  

**Job Description:**
 PayPal in Sweden originated from Zettle, focusing on commerce services targeting small and medium businesses, and is now expanding to contribute to the wider PayPal portfolio.
   

  

**Meet Your Team**
 PayPal is transforming global commerce. Our Product Library Team's mission is to create a scalable and reliable catalog service that serves the entire PayPal ecosystem, delivering seamless solutions to help businesses grow. If you’re passionate about solving complex challenges, working on high-impact projects, and driving innovation, our team is the perfect fit for you..
   

  

**Your way to impact**
 Product Library is the backbone of one of the most critical capabilities for medium and small businesses — building and supporting the Product Catalog Service that powers a unified experience for merchants across PayPal. As a Backend Developer, you’ll engage in critical tasks such as code refactoring, writing robust tests, and improving observability to assess and optimize migration impact.
   

  

**What you need to succeed:**
* Java programming with modern frameworks as Dropwizard or Spring Boot;
* Experience in code refactoring patterns and decoupling large codebase monoliths into microservices;
* Experience in data migrations patterns;
* Building distributed and highly scalable systems;
* Working with continuously delivered systems;
* SQL databases as PostgreSQL;
* Cloud development with Docker, preferably in AWS;
* Pair/Mob programming.


**The traits to exceed:**
* Great passion for working close with product and solving complex problems in small, agile, and cross functional teams;
* Ability to collaborate and communicate with a lot of different colleagues within the business functions as well as with other engineers;
* You gladly share your knowledge, experience, and opinions while understanding and respecting that the last word comes from the team;
* You are known for your strong desire to learn and your endless appetite for exploring new things.


**Earn extra points if you also have experience in:**
* Automated testing;
* AWS (ECS, RDS, SNS, SQS, S3);
* FinTech or/and financial services.


**We Believe in You**
 Interested? Don't hesitate to apply or/and let's talk – we'd love to get to know you!
   

  

 For the majority of employees, PayPal's balanced hybrid work model offers 3 days in the office for effective in-person collaboration and 2 days at your choice of either the PayPal office or your home workspace, ensuring that you equally have the benefits and conveniences of both locations.
   

  

**Our Benefits:**
 At PayPal, we’re committed to building an equitable and inclusive global economy. And we can’t do this without our most important asset—you. That’s why we offer benefits to help you thrive in every stage of life. We champion your financial, physical, and mental health by offering valuable benefits and resources to help you care for the whole you.
   

  

 We have great benefits including a flexible work environment, employee shares options, health and life insurance and more. To learn more about our benefits please visit https://www.paypalbenefits.com
   

  

**Who We Are:**
 To learn more about our culture and community visit https://about.pypl.com/who-we-are/default.aspx
   

  

**Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion**
 PayPal provides equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local law. In addition, PayPal will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities. If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at paypalglobaltalentacquisition@paypal.com.
   

  

**Belonging at PayPal:**
 Our employees are central to advancing our mission, and we strive to create an environment where everyone can do their best work with a sense of purpose and belonging. Belonging at PayPal means creating a workplace with a sense of acceptance and security where all employees feel included and valued. We are proud to have a diverse workforce reflective of the merchants, consumers, and communities that we serve, and we continue to take tangible actions to cultivate inclusivity and belonging at PayPal.
   

  

 Any general requests for consideration of your skills, please Join our Talent Community.
   

  

 We know the confidence gap and imposter syndrome can get in the way of meeting spectacular candidates. Please don’t hesitate to apply.
   

  

 REQ ID R0120508

title: Senior Software Engineer
company_industry: Technology, Information and Media, Spectator Sports, and Entertainment Providers
description:
**Build smart tooling and automation that makes a BIG difference for the Toptracer business!** 




  





**WANT TO REVOLUTIONIZE GOLF?** 




  





**Our mission** 
 is to help people enjoy the wonderful game of golf even more by developing tracing technology for TV and gamification to ranges. Our product brings people together and encourages them to get active which enables a healthier lifestyle. Our range technology is used globally and millions of people spend their quality time bonding and playing with their family and friends. Our broadcast technology is aired worldwide and makes the tournaments really enjoyable for the TV viewers. ⛳️ 📺 🎥
 



  





**At our new office** 
 , you can expect to meet humble, helpful and driven colleagues. You will join an organization where everyone has a voice and can make an impact. You'll have the opportunity to contribute to something meaningful as we undergo exciting changes and growth. We are committed to creating an environment where you can grow professionally and individually. As well as creating a social work environment by creating fun activities like morning fika, gym sessions, mob programming, after-work, table tennis, and golf simulator sessions to name a few! 🥳 🏓 ☕️
 



  





**We are proud** 
 to be on a journey where we're focused on helping people worldwide improve their golf game which leads to healthy, active and social lifestyles. All of our products are developed, tested and deployed from our newly renovated R&D office in Stockholm, Sweden. Join us at Toptracer Technologies and be part of a team dedicated to creating positive change through technology and innovation! 🚀 💻 💙
 



  





**THE ROLE** 




 The team is now looking for a Junior Software Engineer with a broad background in software development, you will be driving technical decisions within the team and taking an active part in the company’s overall architectural and strategic discussions around ensuring scalability and enabling growth. Day-to-day you will be writing code with the team.
 



  





**THE TEAM** 




 The Orchestration Team at Toptracer develops scalable software to enhance operations, efficiency, and productivity. We aim to expand Toptracer Range locations with robust, scalable software, leveraging Kubernetes, observability tools, and standardized OS for servers and edge devices. We automate provisioning for physical and virtual servers and network devices.
 



 As we tackle automation challenges, you'll play a key role in technical decisions, architecture, and strategy while staying hands-on with the code. Join us to shape the software architecture of an innovative tech company alongside a passionate, diverse team.
 



  





**TECH STACK** 



* AWS and Docker for running and hosting backends and API’s
* Python for backend and general application development
* Flask for API development
* Kubernetes for orchestration and application environment
* Angular and React for web frontend
* PostgreSQL for database
* Bash for general scripting
* Linux for dev as well as prod environments.



 (All of the technologies mentioned above are not required to apply for the role)
 



  





**POSSIBILITIES** 



* Work in an autonomous team with competent, engaged, driven and creative colleagues who are great collaborators
* Build smart tooling and automation that makes a BIG difference for the business
* Drive architectural decisions at team level
* Build relationships with many teams, both in operations and in development
* Broad understanding of Toptracer’s technology
* Be part of a team and organization that embraces change
* Enable Toptracer’s world-leading technology to grow and deliver more FUN to the world!



  





**WE BELIEVE YOU** 



* Have experience in software development and a strong willingness to learn in a collaborative environment.
* Have basic experience or understanding of deploying and maintaining cloud-based and distributed systems.
* Have some familiarity with AWS and an interest in learning to build CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Gitlab) for Linux environments.
* Are curious about understanding how large systems and their components integrate.
* Have some experience in backend programming (e.g., Python with Flask/Django/FastAPI) and are motivated to enhance your skills.
* Are comfortable working in an agile environment and open to feedback.
* Are enthusiastic about learning software architecture while enjoying hands-on coding tasks.
* Are motivated to contribute to architectural discussions and decisions as you develop your expertise, helping the team manage architecture effectively.



  





**MORE ABOUT TOPTRACER** 




  





**Workplace** 




  





 We value fully engaged associates who come to work because they enjoy their work and the colleagues they have. We strive to create a diverse and inclusive work environment where everybody can reach their full potential. We provide opportunities for all the colleagues to develop internally and to meet each other. We have a strong commitment and dedication at Toptracer. That comes from the activities and moments we share together and the product we are developing.
 



  





 In addition to that, our technology is unique and world-leading which makes the journey extra exciting. We create a product that encourages people to be outside and get activated which enables a healthier lifestyle. As a colleague at Toptracer, you can either go to a range near your home to experience the product you have developed or just turn on the TV to see it in the biggest golf tournaments.
 



  





**Culture** 




 Our culture is driven by our mission to create moments that matter for everyone and our values for Caring, Courage, One Team, Fun and Excellence.
 



  





**Activities** 



* After-work
* Pair/Mob programming
* Conference
* Dart
* Gym sessions
* Table-tennis
* Golf simulator
* Golf tournaments



  





**Benefits** 



* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies and projects.
* Collaborative and innovative work environment.
* Professional development and growth opportunities.
* A hybrid work environment with the primary workplace at our cozy and welcoming office in Mörby Centrum, Danderyd.
* And of course, play golf!



  





 The position is permanent and full-time, located at our office in Stockholm. We hope to hear from you soon!

title: Administrator Gerstaberg Project
description:
Location:
 **153 30 Järna, Sweden** 




 Company: OHLA Sverige
 



  





 We are looking for a detail-oriented, highly organized, and proactive individual to join our team as a Site Assistant to Gerstaberg Project. This role will play a key part in supporting our operations, managing invoices, warehouse bookings, and office administration tasks. You'll work closely with various departments to ensure smooth coordination and contribute to project success.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Verifying/Rejecting/Scanning invoices
* Managing the E-mail inboxes for invoices
* Delivery notes management
* Warehouse bookings in ERP
* Office administration: office material requests, post collection and distribution, subscriptions
* Other tasks related office and project administration
* Infobric System – update ‘subcontractor chain’. Reporting to Client. Monitoring of remarks
* Collects conformity documentation for suppliers and subcontractor – collaboration with Senior Accountant and Procurement Manager
* Order IT equipment & phone, SIM Card for new employees
* Keep hand-over protocols for IT equipment and inventory list updated
* Collaboration with IT Spain; KMA; HR
* Sustainability Report Company & projects: collection of data



  





**What We Are Looking For:** 



* Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.
* Ability to manage multiple tasks and work effectively with different teams.
* Experience with ERP systems and office administration tasks.
* Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
* Ability to maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information.
* Experience in the coordination of IT and office equipment a plus.



  





 At OHLA Sverige, we offer more than just a job – we provide an opportunity to grow, learn, and make a real impact. Here are some of the key benefits of joining our team:
 


* **Collaborative Environment:** 
 Work alongside experienced professionals in a supportive and inclusive team culture where your contributions are valued.
* **Diverse & Dynamic Work:** 
 Every day brings something new – whether it’s managing different tasks or collaborating with various departments, you’ll be constantly challenged and engaged.
* **Career Growth:** 
 We believe in continuous learning and offer opportunities for career development and skill-building, helping you reach your full potential.



  





 If you're a self-motivated, proactive professional looking for a dynamic role where you can contribute to a growing company, we'd love to hear from you!

title: Simuleringsingenjör inom energisystem
company_industry: Electric Power Generation and Civil Engineering
description:
Vi söker en teknisk fysiker som antingen söker sitt första jobb efter studierna, eller som samlat på sig ett par års erfarenhet sedan examen. I rollen får du utlopp för ditt intresse för att bygga simuleringsmodeller som speglar verkligheten. Du använder både din uppfinningsrikedom och faktabaserade problemlösning för att utveckla framtidens energilagringssystem med hög kapacitet.
 



  





**OM TJÄNSTEN:** 




 Här kommer du arbeta på ett spännande bolag som utvecklar avancerade energilagringssystem. Du kommer tillhöra R&D och kliva in i en ny roll som syftar till att säkerställa en hög kvalitetsnivå på högkapacitativa energilagringssystem, som produceras i samma hus.
 



 På kundförfrågan simulerar du batteriprestanda för att avgöra hur batteriet bäst konfigureras för att möta specifika krav. Du utvecklar modeller som fokuserar på termiska och fysikaliska utmaningar, där Matlab är ditt huvudsakliga verktyg.
 



  





**VI SÖKER DIG SOM:** 



* Har en civilingenjörsutbildning i teknisk fysik eller motsvarande
* Kunskap i Matlab
* Har grundläggande kunskaper i svenska och engelska då båda språken används i det dagliga arbetet



 Det är meriterande om du har 1-5års arbetslivserfarenhet från liknande roller, där du kommit i kontakt med att simulera prestanda av hårdvarukomponenter.
 



 Du är analytisk, faktabaserad och uppfinningsrik. Rollen kräver att du är självgående och har ett stort eget driv. Du har ett genuint teknikintresse och brinner för utveckling inom energisystem.
 



  





**OM ANSTÄLLNINGEN:** 




 Detta är ett konsultuppdrag vilket innebär att du kommer till en början att vara anställd av Friday. Ambitionen från Kunden och vår sida är att du efter ca 12 månader blir direktanställd hos kunden.
 



  





**ÖVRIG INFO:** 



* Omfattning: Heltid
* Start: Enligt överenskommelse
* Placering: Stockholm
* Rekryteringsansvarig: Anna Persson
* Lön: Marknadsmässig



  





 Ansök genom att klicka på länken nedan. Kom ihåg att vara snabb med din ansökan då vi gör löpande urval av kandidater och att annonsen kan stängs ner innan tjänsten är tillsatt om vi gått över till urvals och intervjufasen.
 



  





**OM FRIDAY:** 




*Genom att vara en partner både till våra kandidater och kunder strävar vi efter att hitta den bästa matchningen. Det gör vi genom att lära känna våra kunder och kandidater på riktigt! Vi ser självklart till att kunskaps- och erfarenhetskrav matchar, men framförallt lägger vi vikt vid samsyn kring värderingar och företagskultur som båda parter värdesätter.* 




*Vår passion är att hjälpa människor till rätt roll, arbetsplats och sammanhang inom IT och teknik. Därför grundade vi Friday med ambition att hjälpa dig till jobbet som ger dig fredagskänslan – varje dag!* 




*Vi riktar oss främst till dig som är i början av din karriär eller studerar vid högskola/universitet inom IT och Teknik.* 




*Vår övertygelse är att människor uppnår sin fulla potential när man ser fram emot att gå till jobbet varje morgon. ”Friday – everyday”, hur låter det?* 




  





  





  





*Sökord: Simulation, Matlab, Modeling, Battery performance, Energy systems, Engineering physics, Thermodynamics, Thermal modeling, Electrical engineering, Hardware simulation, Control systems, R&D, Energy storage, System modeling, Power systems, Simulation Engineer, Battery Engineer, Energy Systems Engineer, R&D Engineer, Engineering Graduate, Technical Physicist, Control Systems Engineer, Simulering, Modellering, Energiteknik, Energisystem, Batteriteknik, Termodynamik, Civilingenjör, Teknisk fysik, Energilagring, Prestandasimulering*

title: Ledningskoordinator
description:
Vill du vara med och utveckla morgondagens företag och organisationer? På PwC är vi proaktiva rådgivare som jobbar för att göra skillnad i samhället. Vi förstår att erfarenhet och kunskap är värdefulla tillgångar, och därför är det viktigt för oss att du får bidra med din stora expertis för att främja PwC utveckling. Tillsammans kan vi skapa en meningsfull och givande karriär för dig.
   

  

**Bli en del av PwC:s administrativa supportenhet inom revision**
 Våra konsulter och ledare behöver support i sitt dagliga arbete och här kommer du tillsammans med andra vara en viktig del i att allt flyter på. Du stöttar enhetschef och ledningen i deras dagliga arbete och koordinerar enhetens supportfunktioner. Den här rollen kräver att man har hög integritet, är lyhörd och driven och orädd. Gilla när ingen dag är den andra lik, och med en inställning om att inget är omöjligt kommer man långt.
   

  

 Inom revision skapar vi förtroende hos våra kunder och i samhället genom att säkerställa tillförlitligheten i finansiell information. Vi erbjuder tjänster inom till exempel finansiell revision och rådgivning till alla typer av företag och ideella organisationer. Den digitala utvecklingen och ökade krav på transparens bidrar till att framtidens revision kommer att kräva mer mångfacetterad kompetens än tidigare, där vårt mål är att skapa långsiktigt hållbara resultat för våra kunder.
   

  

 Läs mer om våra tjänsteområden inom revision
   

  

**Vad innebär rollen?**
 I den här rollen är man navet på enheten och arbetar tätt tillsammans med andra erfarna koordinatorer för att kunna leverera på bästa sätt. Som ledningskoordinator har man ett nära samarbete med enhetschefen och dess ledning. Att ha tekniskt kunnande och en varierad erfarenhet av detta är en bra förutsättning för att smidigt kunna lära sig och hantera alla våra system.
   

  

**Exempel På Arbetsuppgifter**
* Hantera kalender, planering och uppföljning
* Mailhantering och korrespondens
* Förbereda material och underlag inför möten i god tid
* Årsplanering med möten, projekt etc
* Delaktig på möten och föra protokoll
* Delta och driva i olika projekt inom enheten från planering, genomförande och avslut.


**Vad söker vi hos dig?**
* Ett par års erfarenhet av administrativt arbete, gärna kopplat till ledningsgrupper
* En teknisk nyfikenhet och en vana vid olika IT-miljöer, affärssystem och program
* Fullständig gymnasieutbildning.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.


 För att lyckas som Ledningskoordinator hos oss på PwC trivs du i en roll som kräver att du är noggrann, har god organisationsförmåga, flexibel och trivas i en dynamisk miljö, har en stor portion prestigelöshet samt ett starkt självledarskap. Nyckeln i denna roll ligger i ditt intresse att bygga och utveckla goda, professionella relationer, där ditt arbete skapar värde genom att säkerställa att material och underlag är korrekta, uppdaterade och inlämnade i tid.
   

  

 Du kanske inte är allt detta idag men vårt mål är att ge dig rätt förutsättningar till att bli en mästare på att hantera många parallella dialoger både externt och internt och att du drivs av att ha en koordinerande roll!
   

  

 ,
   

  

**Rekryteringsprocessen**
 Välkommen med din ansökan till oss senast den 24 februari 2025. Vi kommer att gå igenom ansökningarna löpande och tjänsten kan tillträdas tidigare än sista ansökningsdagen.
   

  

 Tillsvidare med provanställning sex månader, med start så snart som möjligt
   

  

**Vi ber dig bifoga följande handlingar med din ansökan:**
* CV
* Personligt brev
* Betyg från högst avklarad utbildning (ex. Gymnasium/Universitet/Högskola)


 Vi tror på att ha en rekryteringsprocess som gäller för alla. För att bidra till en opartisk och rättvis urvalsprocess inkluderar vi arbetspsykologiska tester.
   

  

 Vi värdesätter det personliga mötet för att se vilket värde just du kan tillföra PwC men också vad vi kan erbjuda dig. Intervjuprocessen består vanligtvis av flera steg och olika typer av intervjuer. När du träffar HR, har du en kompetensbaserad intervju där vi tittar på personlighetstestet som du genomfört innan intervjun. Vid intervjun med verksamheten får du möjlighet att träffa det aktuella teamet för att gå igenom rollen. Vi kallar till intervju löpande.

title: Salesforce Marketing Cloud Specialist
description:
Accenture Song is world’s largest tech powered creative agency focused on executive-level effort to deliver outstanding creative customer experiences for our clients. You will be part of an exciting environment as we have the energy and pace of a start-up, merged with the stability of a well-established Accenture consultancy.
   

  

 Technology is at the core of change today, and we are one of the world’s leaders in helping drive that change, with strong ecosystem relationships. We combine our strength in technology and leadership in cloud, data and AI with unmatched industry experience, functional expertise and global delivery capability. We are uniquely able to deliver tangible creative outcomes because of our broad range of services, solutions and assets across Song, Strategy & Consulting, Technology, Operations, and Industry X.
   

  

 These capabilities, together with our culture of shared success and commitment to creating 360° value, enable us to help our clients reinvent and build trusted, lasting relationships. We measure our success by the 360° value we create for our clients, each other, our shareholders, partners and communities. Visit us at www.accenture.com.
   

  

**The Salesforce Marketing Cloud Specialist** 
 will focus on both technical development and strategic execution. You will work on marketing automation solutions, leveraging Marketing Cloud functionality for campaign orchestration, audience segmentation, and flow building. In addition, you will be responsible for ensuring these efforts contribute to revenue growth by aligning marketing solutions with sales objectives for our clients.
   

  

 You will also play a key role in defining project scopes, managing timelines, and coordinating with cross-functional teams to ensure the successful delivery of marketing solutions for various clients in the Nordics. This includes overseeing the maintenance and monitoring of automated jobs, as well as identifying opportunities for optimization and enhancement.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
- Analyze and interpret the marketing architecture of the MarTech ecosystem.

- Translate technical aspects into business language

- Stakeholder & Project Management

- Campaign orchestration (automation configuration, coordination of marketing campaigns, CRM integrations, and implementations).

- Collaboration with other team members to confirm the feasibility of integrating the solution with other tools and platforms.

- Collaborate closely with DBAs, AWS & Azure admins, and other related teams to ensure the correct functionality of the different marketing platforms

- Review and interpretation of technical requests associated with SFMC.

- Troubleshoot the different integrations of the marketing ecosystem

- Manages client and team expectations throughout delivery; flags risks and issue escalations related to the campaigns.

- Monitors the platform availability and runs analysis to detect possible issues and fix them appropriately

**Basic Qualifications**
- Minimum 5+ of years of proven marketing experience, including stakeholder management, campaign management, marketing service provider, marketing agency, and marketing operations.

- Minimum 3+ years of experience with Salesforce Marketing Cloud

- You are teachable, adaptable, technically gifted, service-minded and you have the desire to develop professionally in a dynamic organization.

- Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science or related field.

- You work well both independently and as part of a team and communicate effortlessly in English. Swedish language skills are seen as an advantage.

- Can advise in how to do Third-party code implementation.

- Strong written and verbal communication skills to articulate project requirements, communicate project status, and interface with internal and external team members

- Comfortable in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment with rapidly changing priorities and a high volume of projects.

- Provide API advisory and facilitate the effective consumption of SFMC APIs

- Client service delivery experience.

- Prioritization and documentation skills

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Well-known in the Salesforce Ecosystem, you have maybe experience with Salesforce Sales & Service Cloud, Marketing Cloud Personalization (Formerly Interaction Studio), Loyalty Cloud, Marketing Cloud Account Engagement (Formerly Pardot), Data Cloud or other related Salesforce Clouds.

- Knowledge in JavaScript (intermediate), code validation, SQL (database queries), HTML, CSS (basic)

- Relational and non-relational database experience

- Intermediate knowledge of responsive & fluid code optimized for email

- Best practices when it comes to implementation of Emails, SMS, Mobile Push messages.

- QA and troubleshooting experience with email optimization tools (EOA, Litmus, mailmodo, Return Path)

- Knowledge about email, SMS & MobilePush legal compliance

- Experience across more than one Industry, e.g., Life Sciences, Retail, and Financial Services.

- Marketing background or experience (Complex Campaigns | Browse, Abandoned Cart, Welcome Series, SFTP, Coupon Offers, IP Warming - Deliverability - Spam)

**What we offer to you:**
- Competitive salary, benefits package and good work-life balance

- Opportunities for professional growth and development across Nordics and Accenture globally

- Learning new skills through trainings and completing certifications

- The possibility to connect with people through our global and local networks and fun clubs

- A collaborative and inclusive work environment

- The chance to work on high-impact projects with leading industry clients

- People Lead Program: A dedicated mentor to guide you during your career journey

**Make your move now!**
 We are looking forward to receiving your detailed CV. We are continuously evaluating the applications.

title: JENSEN komvux Medborgarplatsen söker APL-samordnare
description:
**JENSEN education** 
 är ett av Sveriges främsta privata utbildningsföretag och växer i snabb takt och med målsättningen att vara Sveriges bästa skola. Vi står för hög kvalitet och långsiktighet. Vi söker nu en engagerad APL samordnare till JENSEN komvux Medborgarplatsen!
   

  

**Vår företagskultur präglas** 
 av höga ambitioner, professionalitet, hälsoprofil och även en uttalad dresscode. Vi har en positiv teamkänsla där alla medarbetare bidrar i att ta ansvar för helheten. På vår senaste nationella medarbetarenkät rekommenderar hela 93% JENSEN som arbetsplats!
   

  

**Om arbetet**
 Uppdraget som APL samordnare innebär främst att anskaffa APL, praktikplatser till eleverna och att förbereda eleverna inför arbetslivet. Du har förmånen att vara med i och påverka utvecklingen av vår utbildningsverksamhet. Utbildningarna sker i samverkan med, och i syfte att, förse branschen och det lokala näringslivet med ny kompetens. Du är högst delaktig i att säkerställa att våra elever får praktisk erfarenhet inom sina respektive yrkesområden.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
 Vi söker dig med minst 5 års säljerfarenhet och goda branchkontakter, det är meriterande om du har ett stort kontaktnät inom IT och tech branschen samt en förståelse för elbranschen . Du är drivande och relationsskapande och har lätt för att både bygga och upprätthålla långsiktiga relationer.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som:
   

  

* har lätt för att ta kontakt med företag
* driver leads framåt
* har erfarenhet av att delta i mässor
* kan samordna programråd och yrkesdagar
* har administrativt ordningssinne
* kan samverka med facket och branschorganisationer
* är flytande i svenska i både tal och skrift


 Körkort och bil är att föredra då arbetet innebär att besöka både elever och företag i Stockholm.
   

  

**Anställningsform**
 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid med start omgående. För den här tjänsten tillämpar vi sex månader provanställning.
   

  

**Din ansökan**
 Du ansöker genom att registrera din profil och bifoga ett personligt brev och CV i vårt rekryteringssystem. Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via webben, ansökningar som kommer in på annat sätt kan tyvärr ej behandlas. Urval sker löpande, därför vill vi gärna ha din ansökan så snart som möjligt.
   

  

 Inom skolan måste du enligt lag (2000:873) visa upp ett utdrag från belastningsregistret. Utdraget görs via polisen.se med digitalt BankID. Om du inte har BankID, så kan du beställa hem blanketten, gör detta så snart som möjligt då manuell hantering av blanketten tar lång tid.
   

  

 Första steget i vår rekryteringsprocess är att genomföra två arbetspsykologiska tester. Testlänkar skickas på mail direkt efter inskickad ansökan och du får återkoppling på testerna direkt efter att du har genomfört dem.
   

  

**Kontaktuppgifter**
 Vill du veta mer om tjänsten och hur det är att jobba hos oss, vänligen kontakta rektor Maria Eriksson på maria.eriksson2@jenseneducation .se alt. rektor Adam Arsenius på adam.arsenius@jenseneducation.se .
   

  

 Vill du veta mer om hur det är att jobba på JENSEN komvux? Läs mer här!
   

  

**Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!**
 JENSEN education är ett av Sveriges största privata utbildningsföretag med förtroendet att utbilda drygt 17 000 elever inom fem olika områden – förskola, grundskola, gymnasium, vuxenutbildning samt yrkeshögskola. JENSEN grundades 1996 av Håkan Jensen, företagets vd och ägare, och står för långsiktighet, kvalitet och ansvarstagande. Utbildningskonceptet ”Träning för verkligheten och bildning som mål” genomsyrar all verksamhet.

title: Product Specialist CBCT / Imaging (m/f/d) Scandinavia
description:
Dürr Dental Global GmbH is a full sales subsidiary of the German Dürr Dental SE. As technology leader in its field of business, the Dürr Dental group with its more than 1.350 employees develops, produces and sells system solutions and services for the health sector with an annual business turnover of more than € 374 million with customers in 174 countries in 2024 all over the world.
   

  




  


**Your Responsibilities:**



  

* successfully managing and expanding the Duerr Dental digital portfolio for the region Scandinavia (Sweden, Norway, Denmark) and Iceland
* direct interaction with our long standing partners and customers
* generating successful leads
* building new relationships and fostering existing
* representation of Duerr Dental at trade fairs and events throughout the region
* translation of tactical plans into the regional marketing plan to achieve projected targets
* creation of an inclusive team culture


  


**Requirements:**



  

* dental/medical background preferred
* expertise in X-ray and proven track record in IT or digital and software
* strong commercial acumen and experience conducting market and competitor analysis
* excellent presentation and communication skills
* strong understanding of product strategy from launch to successfully implementing dental Imaging products
* high-performing, responsible and result driven team player
* analytical and strategic yet creative, innovative and independent work ethics
* direct interaction with our long standing partners and customers
* residence in Sweden or at least in Scandinavia
* willingness to travel and occasional weekend work as well as a valid driver’s license


  


**Our Offer:**



  

* competitive and performance-based compensation package
* flexible work environment with the possibility to work remote
* We value teamwork and cooperation: You will work in a highly motivated team with a target-oriented atmosphere
* professional development opportunities e.g. through online training platform, regular product trainings and induction at our German HQ near Stuttgart
* open corporate culture and short decision-making processes within a family-owned company
* space for creativity and the chance to influence the international growth of DÜRR DENTAL


  


 DÜRR DENTAL GLOBAL GMBH
   

 Höpfigheimer Strasse 17
   

 74321 Bietigheim-Bissingen

title: D365 Business Applications Practice Lead - Sweden
description:
The Sweden Business Applications Practice Lead is responsible for driving the practices growth and solidifying Avanade’s position as a leading strategic
   

  

 partner. Reporting to the Head of Practice Leads and aligning with the global practice, this role ensures Dynamics 365 technical solution excellence and
   

  

 delivery integrity. The Sweden Business Applications Lead will oversee technical execution, cultivate team skills in current and emerging Microsoft technologies, and implement a comprehensive talent strategy to support business needs.
   

  

**Come join us**
 With direct client impact, this role exemplifies Avanade’s values and leadership behaviors, fostering a culture of innovation and excellence. The Sweden Business Applications Lead will be a critical player in delivering high-quality solutions, ensuring alignment with business goals, and supporting talent deployment to meet evolving client and organizational priorities.
   

  

**Skills And Experiences**
* Significant relevant consulting experience designing, selling, and leading client engagements with Dynamics AX/D365 Finance & Operations. Dynamics Customer Engagement skills are highly desirable. Proven competency & skills in practice.


**About You**
**Characteristics that can spell success for this role:**
* People Management: Proven experience leading teams at the regional level, with a focus on delivering results, growing skills, fostering culture, and EVP.
* Technical Expertise: Strong understanding of D365 Finance and Supply Chain and/or D365 Customer Engagement, ensuring technical excellence and solution integrity across the region.
* Client Engagement: Ability to build and maintain strong client relationships, ensuring the delivery of high-quality solutions that meet regional client needs.
* Strategic Alignment: Experience working within a matrix, aligning regional goals with global strategies while addressing local market needs.
* Growth Mindset: Demonstrated ability to capitalize on growth opportunities, ensuring the practice remains competitive and responsive to market trends.
* Delivery: Strong delivery skills and experience delivering complex projects


**What You'll Do**
**Market Development and Sales Support**
* Implement Global Strategy: Implement the global Business Applications practice strategy within the region. Set and communicate regional practice priorities. Lead region practice in line with agreed plans and KPIs. Provide feedback loop upwards to drive continuous improvement. Identify opportunities for inorganic growth.
* Client Relationships: Own and extend client relationships, becoming a client advisor with tangible contributions to the region and clients, helping broaden the regions’ client network, identify opportunities for growth, and deliver an exceptional client experience.


**Strategic Relationships and Innovation**
* Strengthen Regional Microsoft & Accenture Partnerships: Cultivate and sustain a close working relationship with local Microsoft Product Engineering Groups and relevant Accenture leaders; and with on-, near, and offshore delivery centers positioning us as the partner of choice and important source of product feature feedback.
* Ecosystem Partners: Establish and maintain close relationships with key regional ecosystem partners to facilitate collaboration in solutioning and delivery.
* Innovation and Future-readiness: Stay informed of client feedback, emerging trends, and innovations, providing ideas to global for new opportunities for practice-relevant solutions to maintain competitive edge. Foster and incubate innovations locally. Help establish and support innovative strategies to lower our cost to serve based on market demands.


**Practice Solutioning and Delivery**
* Solution Development: Collaborate with region client teams to customize GTM motions and develop technical solutions for clients. Harvest best-in-class local solutioning assets and best practices and provide to global.
* Solution Integrity and Technical Leadership: Hold local accountability for shaping practice-specific technical solutions, providing oversight on all deals to maintain solution integrity. Address delivery quality escalations and ensure delivery best practices are being solutioned and delivered. Provide thought leadership relevant to the practice, enhancing our impact in the market.
* Capacity for GTM Support, Solutioning, and Delivery: Ensure the regional practice has sufficient capacity to support client teams from pre-sales assets, to solutioning, to delivery of practice-related solutions.


**Practice Talent And Skills**
* Skills Development and Growth: Contribute to and execute the global growth program within the practice for critical skills, including certifications, to keep employees in all sourcing options (on-, near-, & offshore) at the forefront of current and emerging Microsoft technologies. Leverage global job families, skills, & project roles to deliver consistent practice solutions.
* Region Talent Plan: In alignment with the global practice and region client teams, define a holistic regional talent that includes skills, headcount, and location across all sourcing options to meet client demand, support the I&D agenda, and develop a future-ready workforce.
* Utilization and Chargeability: Own accountability for regional practice market utilization and chargeability, ensuring targets are met or exceeded. Collaborate to address any staffing challenges that arise.
* Employee Engagement and Retention: Execute local programs to drive employee engagement, retention, and well-being, cultivating a highly skilled and motivated workforce within the regional practice.
* Career Development and Succession Planning: Communicate career pathways, support leadership development, and own succession planning for the regional practice. Drive employees to broaden of skills, secure promotions, and encourage experience in diverse roles.
* Compensation and Performance: Own talent and performance management processes for assigned practice members. Includes accountability for leading Talent Discussions, understanding talent pipeline, and making pay and promotion decisions in collaboration with HR to ensure consistent standards and reward structures are used.


**KPIs**
* Region Practice C%/MU
* Region Practice Combined Revenue Growth – total revenue GiLC across onshore, nearshore, and offshore
* Region Practice Employee Engagement and Retention
* Region Practice Skills Portfolio and Training


**Learn more**
 To learn more about the types of projects our ERP team works on, check out this info:
   

  

* MSDW Podcast - What it Takes to be a Great Manufacturer
* Be Yourself at Avanade
* Norma Group ERP Transformation
* Metal Exchange Corporation and Microsoft Dynamics 365


 Interested in knowing what’s going on inside Avanade? Check out our blogs:
   

  

* Avanade Insights – exchange ideas that drive tomorrow’s innovation
* Inside Avanade – explore what life is like working at Avanade


**Enjoy your career**
**Some Of The Best Things About Working At Avanade**
* Opportunity to work for Microsoft’s Global Alliance Partner of the Year, with exceptional development and training (minimum 80 hours per year for training and paid certifications)
* Real-time access to technical and skilled resources globally
* Dedicated career advisor to encourage your growth
* Engaged and helpful coworkers genuinely interested in you


  

  

 Find out more about some of our benefits Employee Benefits at Avanade | Avanade
   

  

**A great place to work**
 As you bring your skills and abilities to Avanade, you’ll get distinctive experiences, limitless learning, and ambitious growth in return. As we continue to build our diverse and inclusive culture, we become even more innovative and creative, helping us better serve our clients and communities. You’ll join a community of smart, supportive collaborators to lift, mentor, and guide you, and to lean on your expertise. You get a company purpose-built for business-critical, leading-edge technology solutions, committed to improving the way humans work, interact, and live. It’s all here, so take a closer look!
   

  

 We work hard to provide an inclusive, diverse culture with a deep sense of belonging for all our employees. Visit our Inclusion & Diversity page.
   

  

  

  

 Create a future for our people that focuses on:
   

  

* Expanding your thinking
* Experimenting courageously
* Learning and pivoting


  

  

**Inspire Greatness In Our People By**
* Empowering every voice


  

  

* Encouraging boldness
* Celebrating progress


  

  

**Accelerate The Impact Of Our People By**
  

  

* Amazing the client
* Prioritizing what matters
* Acting as one

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
### **JOB DESCRIPTION**



Vill du också göra världen lite bättre samtidigt som du får arbeta med den senaste teknikutvecklingen? Då är Sigma Industry Development rätt företag för dig.



Vi söker en erfaren **Machine Learning Engineer** som ska bygger avancerade AI-lösningar för bl.a. supply chain och demand forecasting. Uppdraget passar dig som vill kombinera **data science, backendutveckling och MLOps** .



**Du kommer att:**



* Utveckla och produktionssätta maskininlärningsmodeller och ML-pipelines
* Bygga robusta backendlösningar i Python, gärna med FastAPI
* Arbeta nära verksamheten för att utveckla lösningar inom t.ex. supply chain och demand forecasting
* Hantera stora mängder data (batch & stream) och säkra datakvalitet
* Jobba med molntjänster, Google Cloud Platform med Vertex AI
* Följa och implementera goda principer för DevOps, SRE och MLOps
* Samarbeta tvärfunktionellt med utvecklare, data engineers och produktägare


**Vi söker dig som har:**



* 5+ års erfarenhet inom ML-engineering eller liknande roll
* Erfarenhet och certifiering av GCP (Google Cloud Plattform)
* Stark kodvana i moderna språk, särskilt Python (4+ år)
* Erfarenhet av att bygga och skala ML-lösningar till produktion
* God förståelse för AI/ML-tekniker och olika ramverk
* Kunskap om SQL, DBT, och cloud storage-lösningar
* Van att jobba med kravställning, designlösningar och teamkommunikation


**Språkkunskaper**



* Svenska och engelska (i tal och skrift)


**Om oss**



Sigma Industry Development är ett teknik- och konsultbolag inom Sigmagruppen som hjälper både ledande svenska och internationella teknikföretag och innovativa och nytänkande start-ups och scale-ups. Vi verkar inom sektorer så som den gröna energisektorn, fordonsindustrin, transportindustrin, medtech, försvarsbranchen och hållbarhet.



Vår vision är att vara det ledande teknikkonsultbolaget och vår kultur präglas av familjär samhörighet där människan är i centrum. Med över 100 engagerade medarbetare är vi i en stark tillväxtfas. Vår kärnverksamhet ligger i konsultuppdrag ute hos kund, men vi har även ett in-house-team som arbetar uteslutande från kontoret. Precis som vårt namn antyder, är utveckling kärnan i allt vi gör och våra medarbetare engageras av att ta Sigma Industry Development till nästa nivå. Vår tillväxtresa fortsätter och vi behöver bli fler erfarna medarbetare inom projektledning!



**Vi erbjuder**



Vi är stora nog för att kunna erbjuda en bred kundbas och vi har ett gott rykte i branschen, samtidigt som vi är små nog att se dig som individ. För oss är gemenskap viktigt – här ska alla känna sig sedda och välkomna. Som en följd av detta har vi bland annat gemensamma sektionsaktiviteter, ett nätverk för kvinnor och icke-binära, ett mentorskapsprogam och utbildningar inom olika kompetensområden. Vi strävar efter att skapa en miljö där alla kan växa och utvecklas tillsammans. Vår ambition är att tillgodose konsultens önskemål gällande uppdragslängd, sektor och arbetsuppgifter. För oss är en bra balans mellan arbete och privatliv en självklarhet och vi är stolta över att vara en av Sveriges mest attraktiva arbetsgivare. Givetvis har vi också kollektivavtal (via Almega).



**Om Sigma Group**



Sigma Industry Development AB (SID) är ett av sex dotterbolag som ingår i koncernen Sigma Industry East/North Group, vilka i sin tur ingår i Sigma Group (som ägs av familjekoncernen Danir AB). Läs mer om Sigma Industry Development **HÄR** och om Sigma Group på **HÄR** .



Utöver att vara del av ett företag som värnar om teknologisk utveckling, arbetar för en bättre miljö och som främjar jämställdhet, så är en viktig del av vår verksamhet socialt ansvarstagande. Mer information om detta hittar du **HÄR** .


* #### **POSITION**


Machine Learning Engineer
* #### **COMPANY**


Sigma Industry Development
* #### **LOCATION**


Sweden
* #### **COMPETENCE AREA**


Testing and Verification, System design, Business Intelligence, Business Systems, System development, Business Analysis, Software development
* #### **PUBLICATION DATE**


2025-04-07
* #### **EXPIRATION DATE**


2025-04-22
* #### **CONTACT**


Kristoffer Billqvist, Kristoffer.Billqvist@sigma.se, +46708102082

Upper Saddle River, NJ 07458

title: Cloud Monitor Engineer
description:
* *Ansök senast: 27 april 2025*
* *Stockholm*
* *Hybrid*
***Arbetsuppgifter***
---------------------

*Vill du arbeta med övervakning och analys av affärskritiska molnlösningar i Azure? Som Cloud Monitor Engineer får du en central roll i att optimera och automatisera övervakningen av våra system, arbeta med moderna verktyg och samarbeta med både utvecklingsteam och säkerhetsfunktioner.*

***Ditt team***  

*Som Cloud Monitor Engineer* *kommer du att ingå i teamet Cloud Foundation, ett tvärfunktionellt team hos oss. Inom området arbetar säkerhetsingenjörer, molnarkitekter, utvecklare tillsammans med stödjande funktioner inom compliance, säkerhet och support med att designa, implementera och vidareutveckla bankens molnlösningar enligt gällande säkerhets- och regulatoriska krav.*

*Rollen innebär nära samarbeten med andra områden i banken såsom säkerhetsfunktioner, on-premise team och bankens operations centers.*

***Din roll***  

*Som Cloud Monitor Engineer blir du en central person för övervakning och analys av våra Azure-miljöer. Du ansvarar för underhåll och optimering av Azure log och monitoreringsverktyg, så som Log Analytics Workspace, där du ser till att rätt data samlas in och att policys följs.*

*Du skapar och underhåller larm för operatörer, dokumenterar larmhantering och arbetar aktivt med att automatisera åtgärder för snabb och effektiv incidenthantering. Dessutom samarbetar du med säkerhetsavdelningarna för att säkerställa att de har rätt loggdata för att kunna upprätthålla en trygg och stabil IT-miljö.*

***Vi har riktigt bra förmåner***
---------------------------------

* *Tjänstepension*
* *Vinstdelningssystem*
* *Gruppförsäkring*
* *Friskvårdsbidrag*
* *Bidrag vid föräldraledighet*
* *Banktjänster*
* *Banking services*
* *Benefit in connection with parental leave*
* *Health promotion subsidy*
* *Group insurance*
* *Occupational pension*
* *Profit-sharing scheme*
***Kvalifikationer***
---------------------

***Din profil***  

*Vi söker dig som är specialist inom Azure Monitorering med djup kunskap om hur man samlar in, analyserar och agerar på övervakningsdata. Du har erfarenhet av Log Analytics och behärskar Kusto Query Language (KQL) eller liknande språk som T-SQL eller ESQL för att extrahera och visualisera data.*

*Du är van vid att hantera incidenter och felsökning, snabbt identifiera problem och använda verktyg som Azure Monitor Alerts, Grafana och Prometheus för att åtgärda dem effektivt.*

*Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av Infrastructure as Code (IaC) med ARM Templates eller Bicep, samt förståelse för DevOps, CI/CD-processer och automatiserad övervakning med PowerShell, Python eller Azure CLI.*

*Vi ser gärna att du har minst 2–3 års erfarenhet av övervakning och felsökning i molnmiljöer, samt av att implementera och optimera övervakningslösningar för både infrastruktur och applikationer. Microsoft-certifieringar, såsom Azure Administrator Associate eller Azure Solutions Architect Expert, är ett plus.*

*Du har en stark analytisk förmåga och ett problemlösningsdriv som hjälper dig att identifiera och åtgärda komplexa tekniska utmaningar. Din kommunikativa förmåga gör att du kan förmedla teknisk information tydligt och anpassat till olika intressenter. Eftersom rollen innebär nära samarbeten med flera funktioner i banken, trivs du i en samarbetsinriktad miljö där du kan bygga relationer och arbeta mot gemensamma mål.*

***Välkommen med din ansökan!***

***Kontaktuppgifter***

***Rekryterande chef:*** *Nabila Yalcin, nabila.yalcin@handelsbanken.se*  

***TA Partner:*** *Oscar Stierncreutz, oscar.stierncreutz@handelsbanken.se*  

***Facklig representant Finansförbundet:*** *Per Almshult, per.almshult@handelsbanken.se*  

***Facklig representant Akademikerföreningen:*** *Bjarne Nilsson, bjarne.nilsson@handelsbanken.se*


  
**Om företaget**
----------------

Hos oss får du ett stort eget ansvar och möjlighet att påverka din egen och bankens framtida utveckling. Våra olika perspektiv, insikter och innovativa idéer utgör en grund för hur vi tillsammans bygger vidare banken för framtiden. För oss är utveckling allt och när du utvecklas, utvecklas banken.


Vi har ett unikt sätt att bedriva bank som bygger på en stark tilltro och respekt för den enskilda människan. Våra värderingar och starka företagskultur har en avgörande betydelse för vår framgång och guidar oss om hur vi uppnår våra mål, samarbetar och stöttar varandra. Genom stark lokal förankring, ett decentraliserat arbetssätt och ett långsiktigt perspektiv skapar vi hållbara relationer genom livets olika skeenden. Hos oss på Handelsbanken är alla viktiga. Vi kommer från olika platser med olika bakgrund, erfarenhet och utbildning. Tillsammans är vi Handelsbanken.  



  

Mer om Handelsbanken *Mer om Handelsbanken*

*TOM* *Bildades 1871*

*TOM* *En av världens starkaste banker*

*TOM* *All verksamhet utgår från kunden*

*TOM* *Decentraliserat arbetssätt med tilltro och respekt för individen*

*TOM* *Rikstäckande kontorsnät på våra hemmamarknader*

*TOM* *Höga hållbarhetsambitioner*

*TOM* *I koncernen arbetar drygt 12 000 medarbetare. 44% av alla chefer är kvinnor.*

*TOM* *Högre lönsamhet än genomsnittet för jämförbara konkurrenter*

*TOM* *Formed in 1871*

*TOM* *One of the world’s strongest banks*

*TOM* *All business starts with the customer*

*TOM* *Decentralised working method based on trust in and respect for the individual*

*TOM* *Nationwide branch network in our home markets*

*TOM* *High ambitions regarding sustainability*

*TOM* *The Group has just over 12,000 employees. 44% of all managers are women*

*TOM* *Higher profitability than the average of peer banks*


  
Nabila Yalcin | Kontaktperson

title: Working Students - Data Science
description:
**Om tjänsten**
---------------

  

Would you like to work for Vattenfall, one of Europe’s leading energy companies with trading activities in the global energy markets? Do you want to contribute to the success of the trading function using your analytical capabilities, programming skills, and commercial comprehension? In that case this student job could be the right one for you.


For our office in **Stockholm** we are looking for 1-2 **Working Students Data Science (m/f/d)** in the Trading Analysis & Algorithms department.


The Trading Analysis & Algorithms department within the Business Unit (BU) Trading works closely with the trading desks and takes the leading role in providing market insights, (fundamental and quantitative) analysis, and ultimately commercial decision support across all commodity areas. As part of the department, the Algorithmic Trading desk works closely with the other trading desks and the Algo Infrastructure team and takes the leading role in algorithmic trading and automated trade execution across BU Trading from the intraday to term horizon.

**Your main tasks and responsibilities as Working Student Data Science:**

* Supporting the energy traders and trading analysts in
	+ Maintaining data feeds and pipelines for market or fundamental data
	+ Identifying, reviewing, and integrating (new) information and sources/feeds for market or fundamental data, e.g., building web scrapers or data quality monitoring tools
	+ Visualizing data and analyses in dashboards
	+ Tackling programming challenges in Python
	+ Further developing and automating routines, procedures, and applications for analysis-related information and data flows
	+ Further developing the fundamental and mathematical market modelling, incl. utilizing machine learning approaches
	+ Conducting commercially relevant quantitative analyses by using advanced analytics
* Be part of the Trading Analysis & Algorithms department and contribute to its analysis output.

**Din bakgrund**
----------------

 **Our ideal Working Student Data Science:**

* Student enrolled at a university in a quantitative subject like data science, statistics, computer science, engineering or natural sciences – with a remaining duration of studies of at least 1 year and a willingness to work primarily from our office (home office possible occasionally)
* Strong programming (esp. Python), statistical, and analytical skills
* Ability to work with large, complex data sets in various formats
* Knowledge of Git and Azure DevOps advantageous but not required
* Good English language skills (both written and spoken)
* Strong communication skills with the ability to communicate with various internal stakeholders and the willingness to share knowledge
* Result oriented, independent, and structured working method with high reliability and readiness to take on responsibility
* Proactive team player with eagerness to learn.

**Mer information**
-------------------

 **Our offer**  

This is an excellent opportunity for ambitious and talented students who wants to gain experience in the commodity business and data science field with a challenging and changeable student job within a leading company in its field. You will be working in interdisciplinary teams and you can always count on support from committed colleagues.

**Our organization**


Vattenfall is a European energy company with approximately 21,000 employees. For more than 100 years we have electrified industries, supplied energy to people’s homes, and modernized our way of living through innovation and cooperation. We now want to make fossil-free living possible within one generation. To be able to reach this ambitious goal we are looking for talented individuals who, in addition to their passion for their own role, also have strong team spirit and want to contribute to supporting a meaningful corporate mission – people like you.

**Business Area (BA) Markets** maximises the value of Vattenfall’s portfolio by optimising and dispatching, hedging, and sourcing for Vattenfall's assets and sales positions. We offer power purchase agreements to operators of wind or solar parks, optimise 3rd party batteries, and enter into origination deals within the B2B segment. We serve as Vattenfall’s single market access to energy commodity markets trading in electricity, emissions, fuels, freight, and renewable certificates. We are responsible for generating profits by taking positions within defined risk mandates and limits. We are active across Europe with around 500 professionals working from Sweden, Germany, The Netherlands, and The UK.


Within Markets the **Business Unit (BU) Trading** is the energy trading hub of the Vattenfall Group.  

Business Unit Trading is responsible for all trading activities around Vattenfall´s asset and customer flows to maximize value creation and improve sourcing costs. It provides all market access services for standard OTC and exchange-based energy commodities for the Vattenfall Group, which means managing all hedge flows, from generation assets or customers, by our market access function. Next to handling our flow business, BU Trading also has a proprietary mandate.

**Location**  

Solna  

  

For more information about the position and the recruitment process you are welcome to contact our recruiter Amanda Pehrsson, amanda.pehrson@vattenfall.com  

  

The trade union representatives in Sweden can be reached via Vattenfall´s switchboard +46 8 739 50 00. Sven-Gunnar Gremlin, Akademikerna and Anders Bohlin, Unionen.  

  

**We welcome your application in English no later than 4th of May**


We kindly request that you do not send applications by any means other than via our website. You apply quickly and easily by answering screening questions and attaching your CV.  

  

At Vattenfall we are convinced that diversity contributes to build a more profitable and attractive company and we strive to be a good role model regarding diversity. Vattenfall works actively for all employees to have the same opportunities and rights regardless of gender, ethnicity, age, transgender identity or expression, religion or other belief, disability or sexual orientation. Click here for further information.  

  

Since Vattenfall is a part of the Swedish critical infrastructure, many of our services are security classed. If this position is security classed the final candidates might be subjected to a security vetting process, according to the Swedish legislation.  

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**

**Om oss**
----------

  

Vattenfall is one of Europe’s largest producers and retailers of electricity and heat. Our main markets are Sweden, Germany, the Netherlands, Denmark, and the UK. The Vattenfall Group has approximately 21,000 employees. We have been electrifying industries, powering homes and transforming life through innovation for more than 100 years.

title: Data Scientist to the Data & Analytics Team in Group and Business Services \u007C SEB, Stockholm
description:
Do you see the potential in data science and want to contribute to accelerating the data journey by applying AI/ML techniques? Then this might be the right challenge for you!  

Since SEB was founded in 1856, our focus on customers and long-term relationships has been at the heart of our success. We aim to drive positive change by providing capital to help everyone reach their goals and accelerate progress towards a sustainable tomorrow. As a leading financial services group in northern Europe, we'll help you grow and empower you to take on more responsibility to create a real difference. Welcome to SEB. **About the role:**
We are looking for a Data Scientist in the Data & Analytics Office to join our group of data professionals. Our Data & Analytics Office is a function within the Group & Business Services - a cross-divisional function with the overall objective to support SEB’s business within a number of areas. Our mission is to empower Group & Business Services by unlocking the potential of data. We provide support to strengthen organizations’ data capabilities, enable data-driven decision-making and leverage process intelligence across Group & Business Services.

As a Data Scientist, you will play an important role in accelerating our organization's data journey and creating business value. In this role you are expected to understand business needs and pain points in the process flows that can be addressed through data-driven solutions. You will have to analyze large datasets, apply advanced statistical and machine-learning techniques to drive actionable insights, data-driven decisions and improve services to the customers.
### **Core roles and responsibilities:**

* Work closely with stakeholders to understand their business needs and identify problems that can be solved using AI/ML techniques.
* Collect and refine business requirements using various methods, such as data-driven insights, interviews, document analysis and workflow analysis.
* Identify opportunities for AI/ML use cases, focusing on optimizing our manual processes and improving customer service.
* Perform data pre-processing, including data collection, cleaning and integration as well as feature engineering
* Run advanced and predictive analyses, perform analytical and machine learning model development, validation using software tools and functionalities
* Test performance and behavior of developed AIsolution, support in deploying models into the production environment
* Communicate outcomes of AI use cases to stakeholders as actionable results
* Collaborate with Business Analysts, Data Engineers, Data Scientists and DevOps teams to execute on AI use cases

### **To thrive in this role, we believe you have:**

* You have a strong academic background in Machine Learning and Data Science (at least hold a Master’s degree in relevant fields).
* You have working experience as a Data Scientist or similar role for at least 3 years and have been involved in exploring and, developing and deploying AI/ML models
* You have proficiency in SQL, the ability to query and manipulate databases.
* You have proficiency in Programming in e.g. R or Python for data science
* You have great data visualization techniques, the ability to create meaningful visualizations and communicate insights
* Experience working with a Google Cloud Platform, Power Platform, or Copilot Studio is highly desirable
* You have excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to take ownership.
* You have great communication skills and fluency in English.

### **What we offer:**

* A unique opportunity to be a part of SEB’s data journey.
* High engagement from the organization to accelerate the AI journey.
* A truly international environment to work side-by-side with experienced colleagues in a diverse and high-performing team.
* Extensive training and learning opportunities.

**Do you want to be a part of SEB?**
It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than **April 30th 2025.** If you have questions about the position, please contact Tomas
Žitkevičius, Head of Data & Analytics for Group and Business Services at tomas.zitkevicius@seb.se, but we will not process applications via email.

Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and history of crime. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
**Learn more about working at SEB on** our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
https://sebgroup.com/career
https://bit.ly/SEBcareer
company_description: More than 15.000 people work at SEB. Working in SEB means being part of an exciting journey, driven by digital transformation

title: Senior DevOps Engineer (Mainframe) 678
description:
The global data privacy software market is projected to grow from $2.36 billion in 2022 to $25.85 billion by 2029.  

So, if you are searching for an innovative career, then the cybersecurity industry might just be the one for you. Protegrity, an international provider of data protection solutions, is looking for new team members who want to make an impact in a company that prioritizes something we all care about: our privacy.  

We need people who recognize the opportunity, can plan effectively, take action and execute in the enterprise marketplace with our intuitive, diverse, and future-forward global teams.  

So, are you up for collaborating with the best in data security?  

Join us on this journey and make an impact with one of the top 25 global software providers. We look forward to making our world become a better place with you on our team.  

Apply and discover what’s next today!  

As a Senior DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for implementing and managing the DevOps approach within an organization. This role is crucial in bridging the gap between development and operations teams, ensuring seamless collaboration and efficient delivery of high-quality software products. You should know how to design, implement, and maintain tools and processes for continuous integration, delivery, and deployment (CI/CD) of software using various cloud platforms. The primary goal is to automate repetitive tasks, reduce manual intervention, and improve the overall user experience, quality, and reliability of software.
### **Responsibilities:**

* + Design, develop, test, and maintain CI/CD pipeline, and maintain continuous integration, delivery, and deployment (CI/CD) process using tools like Jenkins, Git, Artifactory, Docker, Ansible, Terraform, etc.
	+ Define and set development, test, release, update, and support processes for DevOps operations.
	+ Collaborate with development and operations teams to identify and address bottlenecks in the software development lifecycle.
	+ Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to application development, deployment, and operations.
	+ Automate, manage, and optimise the deployment and infrastructure of applications on public cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, GCP.
	+ Monitor and manage infrastructure, ensuring optimal performance, security, and scalability.
	+ Choose the best tools and technologies that fit the business needs.
	+ Lead platform upgrade/migration independently.
	+ Manage stakeholders and mentor junior software developers in gaining experience while assuming DevOps responsibilities.
	+ Stay abreast of emerging technologies and industry trends, then utilise them to enhance the software infrastructure.

### **Qualifications:**

* + BE/ME/MCA or any other degree in a related field.
	+ 3-7 years of relevant DevOps experience.
	+ Knowledge of IBM z/OS and Job Control Language (JCL), assembler, REXX
	+ knowledge on IBM Dependency Based Build (DBB)
	+ Hands-on experience with various DevOps concepts and tools like Continuous Integration (CI) and Continuous Delivery (CD), Git, Jenkins, SonarQube, Artifactory/Nexus.
	+ Experiential learning on Infrastructure as Code tools (like Terraform, Ansible).
	+ Practical experience in building, designing, and maintaining cloud-based applications with AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.
	+ Hands-on experience with container & container orchestration tools like Docker, AWS ECS, Kubernetes.
	+ Strong knowledge of shell scripting and any other programming languages such as Python, Ruby, or Java.
	+ Implemented monitoring tools like Prometheus, Grafana for monitoring infrastructure.
	+ Experience working on Linux-based infrastructure.
	+ Excellent communication and collaboration skills, as well as the ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams.

### **Working Model**

* + This is a hybrid role and will require 1-2 days a week in office.
### **Why Choose Protegrity:**

* + We offer a highly competitive compensation and benefits package as well as the excitement, challenges, and rewards of a fast-growing, entrepreneurial company.
	+ Become a member of a leading Data and GenAI Protection, Privacy and Security company during one of the best market opportunities to come along in a generation.
	+ Competitive Compensation
	+ Paid Time Off (PTO)
	+ Work on global projects with diverse, energetic, team members who respect each other and celebrate differences.

We offer a competitive salary and comprehensive benefits with generous vacation and holiday time off. All employees are also provided access to ongoing learning & development.

Ensuring a diverse and inclusive workplace is our priority. We are committed to an environment of acceptance where you are free to bring your full self to work. All qualified applicants and current employees will not be discriminated against on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, national origin, disability or veteran status.

Please reference Section 12: Supplemental Notice for Job Applicants in our Privacy Policy to inform you of the categories of personal information that we collect from individuals who inquire about and/or apply to work for Protegrity USA, Inc., or its parent company, subsidiaries or affiliates, and the purposes for which we use such personal information.

title: Head of Software Engineering
description:
Head of Software Engineering
Malmo,Sweden
Onsite
Purpose of Role: This role offers the opportunity to lead cutting-edge IIoT platform and application development at the forefront of digital transformation in the mining industry. You'll be part of a dynamic team that values continuous learning, innovation, and technological advancement. At Weir, you'll enjoy a supportive environment where you can tailor your career path, take on new challenges, and make a significant impact. The inclusive and collaborative culture ensures that everyone's contributions are recognized and valued.
What we offer: At Weir, we are proud to provide reward on a basis which is fair and attractive, including a competitive benefits package. Through our ‘We are Weir’ framework, we focus on the importance of our people and the contribution they make to our organisation.
Health & Wellbeing: As a global organisation there isn’t one single solution that will enable us to take a proactive approach to our health and wellbeing. We have built a Health and Wellness framework focusing on Culture & Leadership, Safety & Environmental, Mental Wellbeing, Physical Wellbeing, Digital Wellbeing and Financial Wellbeing for different parts of the business to bring to life in a way that is most meaningful for them.
Grow your Own Way: Everything moves fast in the dynamic world of Weir. This creates opportunities for us to take on new challenges, explore new areas, learn, progress and excel. Best of all, there is no set path that our people must go down. Instead, everyone is given the support and freedom to tailor-make their own career and do the best work of their lives.
Be You and Belong: Weir is a welcoming, inclusive place, where everyone's contribution is recognised and all employees are encouraged to innovate, collaborate and be themselves.
Key Responsibilities:* IIoT Engineering Leadership: Lead the end-to-end development of the IIoT platform and applications, ensuring adherence to best practices in software development and strong collaboration with the System Architect and Analytics team.
* Cloud Engineering: Develop and implement cloud solutions that meet business needs, ensuring high availability, scalability, and security, while leading and mentoring a team of cloud engineers.
* Operations Management: Oversee the operations team to ensure reliable deployment and maintenance of IIoT platforms, implementing DevOps practices to streamline processes and enhance system reliability and scalability.
* Team Leadership and Development: Provide leadership, mentorship, and guidance to the software engineering and operations teams, fostering a culture of continuous improvement, innovation, and professional development.
* Safety First: Demonstrate 100% commitment to our zero harm behaviours in support of our drive towards developing a world class safety culture.


Job Knowledge/Education and Qualifications:* Educational Background: A Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field is required, with a preference for candidates holding a Master's degree.
* Industry Expertise: Proven experience in software engineering and operations, particularly with a focus on IIoT platforms and applications. Expertise in Industry 4.0 technologies, including AI, ML/DL, cognitive solutions, IoT platforms, VR, AR, and digital twins, is essential.
* Cloud and DevOps Proficiency: Deep understanding of cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud, along with experience in cloud services, infrastructure design, implementation, and management. Proficiency in DevOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure automation, is crucial.
* Leadership and Communication Skills: Demonstrated ability to lead and manage high-performing teams, with exceptional influencing skills to navigate a complex global company. Strong communication skills to effectively convey technical concepts and project status to non-technical stakeholders and foster strong relationships with leaders across the organization.


We are Weir! Founded in 1871, Weir engineers solutions that improve safety, efficiency and sustainability – helping to provide the essential resources needed by a growing world. We are a global family. We are proud of our unique blend of talent, technology and culture. We are here to inspire you to do the best work of your life!
/?utm\_source=workday&utm\_medium=advert&utm\_campaign=R0030257*Weir is committed to an inclusive and diverse workplace. We are an equal opportunity employer and do not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, veteran status, disability, age, or any other legally protected status.*
