title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
Are you a Senior DevOps Engineer? Join our innovative team at Teledyne FLIR Defense!
  
Teledyne FLIR Defense is a global leader in defense technologies and integrated sensing solutions with 15,000 employees globally. Since 1978, we have been at the forefront of innovation, continuously pushing boundaries. Our diversified portfolio serves a variety of applications in government and defense, helping military personnel operate efficiently and effectively in various environments.
  
We are now looking for a passionate and talented full-time Senior DevOps consultant to join our team in Arninge/Täby to help us continue to lead the way in surveillance technology. If you're excited about making a difference in the world and working with cutting-edge technologies, this is the place for you!
  
What We Offer
  
**A Friendly and Inclusive Culture:** Join a team that values collaboration, problem-solving, and creativity.
  
**Global Team:** Work alongside passionate colleagues from around the world.
  
**Great Team and Culture:** Collaborate with other talented engineers in a supportive environment.
  
**Financially Stable and Growing Company:** Be part of a company that is financially secure and expanding.
  
**Healthcare Benefits:** Access to healthcare benefits, free gym, and various sports activities.
  
  

Responsibilities
  
Develop and maintain Ansible scripts for deployment and management of Linux-based virtualized development servers.
  
Use Git for version control of Ansible, Groovy, and autotest scripts.
  
Drive and improve CI/CD processes with automated testing.
  
Configure and troubleshoot servers and embedded systems within a corporate network.
  
  

**Required Skills:**  

Ansible
  
Jenkins
  
Git
  
Linux
  
CI/CD
  
Networking (DNS, LDAP, Certificates)
  
Virtualization
  
  

Preferred Skills
  
Atlassian Bitbucket/Jira/Confluence
  
Ubuntu/Debian
  
Yocto Linux
  
CI/CD for embedded systems
  
VMWare Vcenter
  
Artifactory
  
Docker
  
  

Personal Traits for Success
  
Ability to work independently while being part of a team with both shared and individual responsibilities.
  
Strong problem-solving skills and a proactive attitude.
  
Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
  
  

Security Clearance
  
Due to the high-security demands of the defense industry, you will need to undergo a background check. The person needs to be able to work in Sweden, and we perform security background checks on all our employees. This position requires access to export-controlled information or items (i.e., regulated technology or technical data per ITAR/EAR US regulations). Applicants must be eligible to apply for and obtain the appropriate export control license from the U.S. Departments of State or Commerce.
  
We prefer applicants who are okay with working on-site from the office in Arninge/Täby.
  
Join us and contribute to the next generation of defense technology!
company_description: TDY FLIR products are used in a wide array of situations to rescue people in danger, detect criminals, conserve energy, navigate safely, provide security around the globe, and protect our environment.

title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
At FDJ UNITED, we don't just follow the game, we reinvent it.
  
FDJ UNITED is one of Europe's leading betting and gaming operators, with a vast portfolio of iconic brands and a reputation for technological excellence. With more than 5,000 employees and a presence in around fifteen regulated markets, the Group offers a diversified, responsible range of games, both under exclusive rights and open to competition. We set new standards, proving that entertainment and safety can go hand in hand. Here, you'll work alongside a team of passionate individuals dedicated to delivering the best and safest entertaining experiences for our customers every day.
  
  

We're looking for bold people who are eager to succeed and ready to level-up the game. If you thrive on innovation, embrace challenges, and want to make a real impact at all levels, FDJ UNITED is your playing field.
  
Join us in shaping the future of gaming. Are you ready to LEVEL-UP THE GAME?
  
  

The role
  
As we continue to improve our growing platform, we're looking for a motivated DevOps engineer with excellent hands-on and design skills to join our IT team to oversee all aspects of our cloud infrastructure in our multiple offices and locations.
  
Initiative, resourcefulness, and autonomy are essential skills for this role. The DevOps engineer should be able to diagnose and resolve problems reliably, lead continuous improvement culture, and have the patience to communicate with a variety of interdisciplinary stakeholders.
  
Critical attributes for this role also include proactiveness, ability to quickly learn and pick up complex component integrations, manage many competing priorities and think outside the box. Design simple solutions for complex situations.
  
You will know the development life cycle better than the back of your hand including Agile methodologies.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

* Ownership of the CI/CD pipeline ensuring a stable and performant platform/process.
* Effective communication with Operation's and Development teams.
* Continuously improve processes and documentation.
* Effective resolution of assigned tickets and tasks.
* Documentation and knowledge sharing.
* Provide end to end solutions including its execution.
* Provide user support to engineering teams.
* Set up tools and required infrastructure.
* Encourage and build automated processes wherever possible.
* Incident management and root cause analysis.
* Follow the company processes, procedures, and methodologies.
* Collaborate to achieve common goals.
* Support and act in line with the company values.
* Keep up to date with compliance training offered by the company.


Ensure that you adhere to the Governance, Risk & Compliance (GRC) obligations for your role.
  
Identify and raise any non-compliance incidents promptly to your line manager.
  
Challenge processes, policies and projects that will negatively impact compliance within the Group.
  
Complete all mandatory compliance training assigned to you.
  
Reach out to the Compliance Teams if unsure of any of your compliance obligations or the requirements are unclear.
  
  

**Technical skills required:**  

* Design CI/CD pipelines to solve developer's requirements.
* Experience with Android and iOS native apps pipeline, build, test, publishing, etc
* Ability to write code to automate repeatable processes (Ansible, Python, Bash).
* Experience in using containers and orchestration to dockerize existing applications.
* Experience with docker clustering frameworks like Kubernetes, Docker Swarm.
* Experience in building and maintaining existing pipelines and its components, including, but not limited to, Jenkins, SonarQube, NuGet Server, NPM repository, Artifactory, Gitlab, Argocd ... etc.
* Maintain configurations and deployments of software that operates within a highly scalable distributed multi-tenanted environment.
* Understanding of Source Control Management systems like GIT.
* Experience with provisioning tools to treat infrastructure as code, like Terraform.
* Experience with APM tools like App Dynamics, Instana, ability to manage and maintain system configurations.
* Experience with monitoring tools like Prometheus, Kibana, Grafana.
* Exposure to various infrastructure technologies such as Couchbase, Elasticsearch, Oracle, MSSQL, PostgreSQL, and Kafka.
* Exposure to Hyper-V, Openstack, VmWare, RHVE.
* Experience with Azure/GCP and AWS.
* Experience in automation of performance testing.
* Data environments exposure is a plus (Airflow, EMR, SageMaker, Ray, Tensorflow, MLflow, Kubeflow, Dask)


**Working conditions:**  

* Occasional out of hour's conferencing with overseas colleagues.
* Occasional out of hours or weekend work.
* A workplace that supports & role models Diversity & Inclusion. This is a huge part of who we are and what our company stands for.
* Learning & Development to assist you to achieve your career goals.
* Fast-paced agile environment, with leading-edge technology and innovation.
* Work in a collaborative environment with highly talented and motivated colleagues that are passionate about knowledge sharing.


**Functional Skills:**  

* Ability to cope up with competing demands and remain focused on competing priorities.
* Excellent interpersonal skills and ability to communicate with impact.
* Excellent time management and organisational skills.
* Can relate to employees at all levels of the organisation.
* Ability to gain co-operation and commitment.
* People focus.


Our Way Of Working
  
Our world is hybrid.
  
A career is not a sprint. It's a marathon. One of the perks of joining us is that we value you as a person first. Our hybrid world allows you to focus on your goals and responsibilities and lets you self-organise to improve your deliveries and get the work done in your own way.

title: Agile Lead to Home Furnishing Company
description:
A global leader in the home furnishing retail industry is evolving its digital CORE retail offering by implementing a new cloud-based Integration Platform – designed to enable seamless connectivity between internal systems, retail solutions, and global supply networks. As this platform continues to grow, we're looking for an experienced Agile Team Lead to drive its development forward by fostering high-performing teams, championing agile principles, and securing outcome-focused delivery.
  
This is a full-time assignment starting as soon as possible and running until August 31, 2025, with potential for extension. The role is based in Malmö, with a hybrid setup of 2–3 days per week in the office and the remainder remote.
  
**About the role:** You will lead a cross-functional, cloud-focused platform team responsible for developing and scaling a modern integration infrastructure. Working in close collaboration with platform owners, architects, and business stakeholders, your mission is to create an agile, empowered, and technically aligned team that delivers high-impact integration solutions. Your leadership will directly support the realization of measurable business outcomes and platform reliability.
  
**Responsibilities:** Align team delivery with platform strategy and business outcomes through goal-oriented sprint planning
  
Collaborate with stakeholders to define team goals, release scopes, and success metrics
  
Facilitate daily stand-ups, sprint planning, retrospectives, and other agile ceremonies
  
Ensure work items are structured and continuously prioritized for value delivery
  
Drive continuous improvements across practices like CI/CD, automated testing, and DevOps
  
Track KPIs such as integration success rates, platform uptime, and latency
  
Visualize and communicate progress via dashboards and transparent reporting
  
Foster psychological safety and team accountability through supportive leadership
  
Coach the team on agile methodologies, cross-functionality, and ownership mindset
  
Lead outcome-based retrospectives to enable learning and adaptation
  
Partner with product owners, architects, and integration leads to align delivery
  
Support decision-making with clear insights on delivery status and strategic trade-offs
  
  

**About you:**  

You are an experienced Agile Team Lead or Scrum Master who thrives in a high-paced, complex environment. You’ve moved beyond process facilitation and into outcome-based delivery leadership, guiding teams to work autonomously while staying aligned with business value. With a strong grasp of agile methodologies and a good understanding of technical concepts related to cloud-based systems and integrations, you help translate strategy into meaningful team action. You lead with empathy, build trust, and foster ownership across your teams, all while keeping an eye on the real-world impact of the solutions being delivered.
  
**Experience and skills:** Proven experience leading agile software development teams in complex environments
  
Strong knowledge of modern agile practices (Scrum, Kanban, SAFe) and agile coaching
  
Technical understanding of cloud-based platforms and system integrations
  
Proficiency with tools like Jira, Azure DevOps, Confluence, or similar
  
Experience with outcome-based planning, KPIs, and continuous delivery pipelines
  
Excellent stakeholder management and communication skills
  
Comfortable working in hybrid teams and cross-functional settings
  
Fluent in English, both spoken and written
  
  

**About the assignment:**  

For this assignment you will be hired as a full-time consultant by Digitalenta. We offer our consultants a generous package including healthcare allowance, insurance policy, paid vacation days and pension savings. In addition, you'll also have a dedicated consultant manager available throughout your employment with us, in addition to optional networking activities with our network of consultants.

title: Problemlösare - Tech Lead
description:
**På Sogeti tror vi att det bästa finns inom var och en av oss. Oavsett om du är i början av din karriär eller på toppen, kommer vi att uppmuntra dig att nå din högsta potential. Genom vår gemensamma passion för teknik, vår entreprenörskaps-anda och vårt fokus på kontinuerligt lärande, kommer vi att ge dig allt du behöver för att kunna bli den bästa versionen av dig själv.**

**Problemlösare - Tech Lead**
-----------------------------

**Din roll**

**Vi söker dig som ser på dig själv som en problemlösare, som älskar att lösa problem med teknik. Som problemlösare hos oss kan du arbeta med allt från webbutveckling till systemintegration och molnlösningar. I vårt stora globala bolag är möjligheterna oändliga och du får vara med och utveckla samt utvecklas inom det du brinner för. Du kommer att bli en del av ett gäng härliga Sogetiare runt om i Sverige och världen som brinner för teknik och att ha kul tillsammans på vägen. Oavsett om du befinner dig i början av din karriär, eller redan är en väletablerad expert, så kommer vi att uppmuntra dig att fortsätta utvecklas och bli ännu bättre!**

**I denna roll kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i:**

* **Lösa problem med teknik tillsammans med drivna och duktiga kollegor.**
* **Arbeta med allt från webbutveckling till systemintegration och molnlösningar.**
* **Utveckla toppmoderna AI-lösningar och hantera data från gamla legacy-system.**
* **Bidra till en positiv arbetsmiljö och erfarenhetsutbyte.**

**Din profil:**

* **Har ett starkt intresse för teknik och flera års erfarenhet av systemutveckling i olika roller, exempelvis med språk som C#/.NET, JAVA, React, Python.**
* **Trivs att arbeta i team tillsammans med andra.**
* **Kan uttrycka dig väl i svenskt tal och skrift.**
* **Är flexibel, ansvarsfull och gillar att anta nya utmaningar.**

**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas:**

* **Innovativ miljö** **: Hos oss får du chansen att jobba med den senaste tekniken och vara en del av ett dynamiskt team som älskar att skapa värde genom innovation.**
* **Karriärutveckling** **: Vi bryr oss om din framtid och erbjuder utvecklingsprogram och certifieringar i de senaste teknologierna, så att du kan växa och bli den bästa versionen av dig själv.**
* **Flexibelt arbete** **: Vi förstår att livet är mer än bara jobb. Därför erbjuder vi möjligheter till distansarbete och flexibla arbetstider för att du ska må bra och trivas.**
* **Teamkänsla** **: Vi är som en stor familj med en härlig teamkänsla. Genom att leva efter våra värdeord som mod, passion, laganda och entreprenörskap - skapar vi en arbetsmiljö där alla kan trivas.**
**Sogeti Sverige, en del av Capgemini-koncernen, med 21 kontor och 1300 medarbetare, skapar affärsvärde med teknologi för organisationer som behöver införa innovation snabbt och som vill ha en lokal partner med global skalbarhet. Med en hands-on-kultur och närhet till kunderna, implementerar Sogeti lösningar som hjälper organisationer att arbeta snabbare, bättre och smartare. Genom att kombinera agilitet och snabb implementation via en DevOps-ansats, levererar Sogeti innovativa lösningar inom test- och kvalitetssäkring, molnet och systemutveckling, förstärkta av AI, data och automation.**

title: Teknisk testare
description:
**At Sogeti, we believe the best is inside every one of us. Whether you are early in your career or at the top of your game, we’ll encourage you to fulfill your potential to be better. Through our shared passion for technology, our entrepreneurial culture , and our focus on continuous learning, we’ll provide everything you need to do your best work and become the best you can be.**

**Teknisk Testare till Sogeti Stockholm**
-----------------------------------------

**Din roll:**

**Har du erfarenhet av att testa kod med olika verktyg? Trivs du i team där samarbete och kunskapsdelning är av högsta vikt? Då är det dig vi söker! Gå med i vårt team inom Test, DevOps och automatiserade lösningar och bidra till att öka hastigheten och kvalitén i våra kunders systemutveckling!**

**I denna roll kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i:**

* **Skapa och underhålla testautomationsramverk för kvalitétssäkrade IT-leveranser.**
* **Analysera testresultat och coacha utvecklingsteamet inom testområdet.**
* **Hålla dig uppdaterad med de senaste trenderna inom testautomatisering och föreslå förbättringar av testprocessen.**
* **Driva, underhålla och exekvera tester inom DevOps-miljöer.**
* **Leda och genomföra tester i en agil arbetskontext.**

**Din profil:**

* **Mellan 5-8 års erfarenhet av testarbete inom testautomation.**
* **Kunskap i programmeringsspråk som Python, JAVA, .NET.**
* **Erfarenhet av API-testning (t.ex. Postman, SoapUI, Ready API).**
* **Erfarenhet av GUI-testning med verktyg (t.ex. Selenium, Cypress, Playwright).**
* **Erfarenhet av projekthanterings-/testmanagement-system (t.ex. Jira, Azure DevOps).**
* **Erfarenhet av att arbeta med CI/CD pipelines (t.ex. Jenkins, Azure DevOps).**
* **Kunskap om Microsoft Services och SOAP/REST-baserade tjänster och verktyg.**
* **ISTQB-certifiering.**
* **Erfarenhet av att arbeta med testverktyg eller ramverk, såsom verktyg för att generera testfall baserat på maskininlärning.**
* **Flytande i svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift.**
* **Svenskt medborgarskap.**

**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas:**

* **Innovativ miljö: Hos oss får du chansen att jobba med den senaste tekniken och vara en del av ett dynamiskt team som älskar att skapa värde genom innovation.**
* **Karriärutveckling: Vi bryr oss om din framtid och erbjuder utvecklingsprogram och certifieringar i de senaste teknologierna, så att du kan växa och bli den bästa versionen av dig själv.**
* **Flexibelt arbete: Vi förstår att livet är mer än bara jobb. Därför erbjuder vi möjligheter till distansarbete och flexibla arbetstider för att du ska må bra och trivas.**
* **Teamkänsla: Vi är som en stor familj med en härlig teamkänsla. Genom att leva efter våra värdeord som mod, passion, laganda och entreprenörskap - skapar vi en arbetsmiljö där alla kan trivas.**

**Ansökan:**

**Vi välkomnar varmt din ansökan idag, urvalet sker löpande! Om du har frågor om tjänsten eller rekryteringsprocessen, vänligen kontakta Team Manager Daniel Lindström på daniel.lindstrom@sogeti.se**

**Part of the Capgemini Group, Sogeti makes business value through technology for organizations that need to implement innovation at speed and want a local partner with global scale. With a hands-on culture and close proximity to its clients, Sogeti implements solutions that will help organizations work faster, better, and smarter. By combining its agility and speed of implementation through a DevOps approach, Sogeti delivers innovative solutions in quality engineering, cloud and application development, all driven by AI, data and automation.**

---------------------------

**Vi söker dig som älskar att leda testarbete inom SAP! Är du en erfaren testledare med djup kunskap inom SAP? Vill du driva kvalitets- och teststrategier? Då har vi rollen för dig! Som SAP Senior Test Manager hos oss leder du testaktiviteter för SAP-implementationer, inklusive ECC till S/4HANA-migreringar. Du skapar teststrategier, driver kvalitetssäkring och ser till att testprocesser fungerar effektivt genom hela projektlivscykeln.**

* **Planera och leda testarbete inom SAP.**
* **Rapportera testresultat och presentera dem för projektledare och kunder.**

* **Driva innovation inom testautomation och kvalitetssäkring.**
* **Presales och rådgivning inom teststrategier är meriterande.**

**Din profil:**

* **Lång erfarenhet av test inom SAP, minst 5 år som testarkitekt, testledare eller ansvarig testare i införande- eller utrullningsprojekt.**

* **Kunskap om och erfarenhet av verktyg som Azure DevOps, JIRA, SAP Solution Manager, Tosca Tricentis och LoadRunner.**
* **Förmåga att skapa testplaner, testkoncept och testfall samt analysera och lösa defekter i en SAP-kontext.**
* **Erfarenhet av att utföra integrationstester, end-to-end-tester och acceptanstester.**
* **Kunskap om processer och verktyg som behövs för effektiv testning.**
* **Flytande i svenska (tal och skrift) samt god professionell kunskap i engelska.**

På Sogeti är vi övertygade om att information är den nya valutan och vi söker nu efter passionerade AI-profiler med djup teknisk kompetens och en vilja att ständigt lära sig nya saker. description:

Through our shared passion for technology, our entrepreneurial culture , and our focus on continuous learning, we’ll provide everything you need to do your best work and become the best you can be.**

**Data/AI Arkitekt**
--------------------

**Som arkitekt inom Data och AI kommer du att vara en nyckelperson i vårt team och skapa smarta och innovativa lösningar för våra kunder. Din expertis inom Data och AI kommer att kunna bidra både till oss och våra kunder.**

**I denna roll kommer du bland mycket annat att jobba med:**

* **Vara en drivkraft i att utveckla våra tjänster inom Data och AI.**
* **Hjälpa våra kunder att identifiera och realisera sina behov inom datadrivna lösningar och AI-teknologi.**
* **Delta i kundmöten och presentera strategier, möjligheter och konkreta förslag inom innovation, Data och AI**
* **Samarbeta med interna team och kunder för att skapa skalbara och innovativa lösningar.**
* **Följa de senaste trenderna inom Data och AI för att säkerställa att vi alltid erbjuder de mest relevanta lösningarna.**

**Din profil:**

* **Mångårig erfarenhet av AI- och dataverktyg**
* **Stark teknisk bakgrund inom utveckling eller i roller som Data Engineer, Data Scientist**
* **Erfarenhet av maskininlärning, big data-plattformar och molnlösningar**
* **Kunskap och vilja kommunicera komplexa lösningar inom AI till beslutsfattare och därigenom skapa den bästa lösningen för oss för vår kund.**
* **Ett naturligt ledarskap i dig och du gillar att inspirera och driva utveckling framåt.**
* **Tydligt resultatfokus och vilja att skapa värde för våra kunder**
* **Flytande i svenska och engelska (tal & skrift)**

**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas:**

* **Stark sammanhållning: Vi värdesätter ärlighet, integritet och respekt för åtaganden, vilket skapar en rättvis och transparent arbetsmiljö**

* **Innovativ arbetsmiljö: Hos oss får du arbeta med de senaste teknologierna och vara en del av ett dynamiskt team som ständigt strävar efter att leverera värde genom teknik**

title: Spontansökan Jönköping
description:
**At Sogeti, we believe the best is inside every one of us. Whether you are early in your career or at the top of your game, we’ll encourage you to fulfill your potential to be better. Through our shared passion for technology, our entrepreneurial culture , and our focus on continuous learning, we’ll provide everything you need to do your best work and become the best you can be.**

**Spontanansökan Jönköping**
----------------------------

**Intresserad av att jobba på Sogeti i Jönköping men hittar ingen passande tjänst bland våra jobbannonser just nu? Skicka in en spontanansökan! Vi gör en initial bedömning och återkoppling och hör sedan av oss när vi har en tjänst som vi tror passar din profil.**

**Sogeti erbjuder spännande och utvecklande kunduppdrag inom många olika branscher. Vi har uppdrag inom t.ex. systemutveckling, Data/ AI, test, projektledning och mycket annat.Vår arbetsplats präglas av positiv attityd där vi hjälper varandra och har kul på jobbet. Gillar du teknik, är flexibel och intresserad av människor så kommer du att trivas hos oss på Sogeti.**

**Hos oss får du stora möjligheter att växa både som person och konsult.Vi har massor av spännande uppdrag och möjigheter som väntar, både lokalt och nationellt. Våra konsulter erbjuds en flexibel arbetssituation, vilket innebär en mix av att arbeta på plats hos kund och/eller distans från Sogetikontoret eller hemifrån.**

**Låter det intressant eller vill du veta mer? Hör av dig så berättar vi mer eller skicka in en ansökan så återkommer vi till dig så snart vi kan!**

**Works in the area of Software Engineering, which encompasses the development, maintenance and optimization of software solutions/applications.1. Applies scientific methods to analyse and solve software engineering problems.2. He/she is responsible for the development and application of software engineering practice and knowledge, in research, design, development and maintenance.3. His/her work requires the exercise of original thought and judgement and the ability to supervise the technical and administrative work of other software engineers.4. The software engineer builds skills and expertise of his/her software engineering discipline to reach standard software engineer skills expectations for the applicable role, as defined in Professional Communities.5. The software engineer collaborates and acts as team player with other software engineers and stakeholders.****Part of the Capgemini Group, Sogeti makes business value through technology for organizations that need to implement innovation at speed and want a local partner with global scale. With a hands-on culture and close proximity to its clients, Sogeti implements solutions that will help organizations work faster, better, and smarter. By combining its agility and speed of implementation through a DevOps approach, Sogeti delivers innovative solutions in quality engineering, cloud and application development, all driven by AI, data and automation.**

title: Affärsdriven arkitekt inom Data och AI Karlstad
description:
**På Sogeti tror vi att det bästa finns inom var och en av oss. Oavsett om du är i början av din karriär eller på toppen, kommer vi att uppmuntra dig att nå din högsta potential. Genom vår gemensamma passion för teknik, vår entreprenörskaps-anda och vårt fokus på kontinuerligt lärande, kommer vi att ge dig allt du behöver för att kunna bli den bästa versionen av dig själv.**

**Affärsdriven arkitekt inom Data och AI**
------------------------------------------

**Din roll**

**Går du igång på AI och att skapa smarta lösningar till kunden? Gillar du att föra teknisk implementation och göra oss och våra kunder bättre med hjälp av Data och AI? Älskar du att förstå kunders behov och omvandla dem till innovativa lösningar. Då vill vi höra från dig!**

**Vi söker nu en affärsdriven arkitekt inom Data och AI till Sogeti i Karlstad. Våra kunder efterfrågar mer och mer expertis inom AI för att kunna fortsätta utvecklas och där vill vi ha med dig!**

**I denna roll kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i:**

* **Vara en drivkraft i att utveckla våra tjänster inom Data och AI.**
* **Hjälpa våra kunder att identifiera och realisera sina behov inom datadrivna lösningar och AI-teknologi.**
* **Delta i kundmöten och presentera strategier, möjligheter och konkreta förslag.**
* **Samarbeta med interna team och kunder för att skapa skalbara och innovativa lösningar.**
* **Följa de senaste trenderna inom Data och AI för att säkerställa att vi alltid erbjuder de mest relevanta lösningarna.**

**Din profil**

* **Har relevant utbildning och minst 5 års erfarenhet inom Data och AI, kanske som Data Engineer eller Data Scientist.**
* **Har en stark teknisk bakgrund och är bekväm med teknologier som maskininlärning, big data-plattformar och molnlösningar.**
* **Är skicklig på att kommunicera komplexa lösningar inom AI till beslutsfattare.**
* **Är trygg i att bygga relationer och trivs i att agera mentor.**
* **Har naturligt ledarskap och gillar att inspirera och driva utveckling framåt. • Är resultatorienterad och ser att resultat kommer genom att skapa värde för kunder.**

**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas**

* **Stark sammanhållning: Vi värdesätter ärlighet, integritet och respekt, vilket skapar en rättvis och transparent arbetsmiljö.**
* **Karriärutveckling: Vi erbjuder omfattande utvecklingsprogram och certifieringar inom de senaste teknologierna.**
* **Work-life balance: Vi erkänner vikten av balans mellan arbete och privatliv och erbjuder möjligheter till distansarbete och flexibla arbetstider.**
* **Innovativ arbetsmiljö: Hos oss får du arbeta med de senaste teknologierna och vara en del av ett dynamiskt team som ständigt strävar efter att leverera värde genom teknik.**

**Ansökan**

**Varmt välkommen med din ansökan idag. Hoppas vi ses!**

**Sogeti Sverige, en del av Capgemini-koncernen, med 21 kontor och 1300 medarbetare, skapar affärsvärde med teknologi för organisationer som behöver införa innovation snabbt och som vill ha en lokal partner med global skalbarhet. Med en hands-on-kultur och närhet till kunderna, implementerar Sogeti lösningar som hjälper organisationer att arbeta snabbare, bättre och smartare. Genom att kombinera agilitet och snabb implementation via en DevOps-ansats, levererar Sogeti innovativa lösningar inom test- och kvalitetssäkring, molnet och systemutveckling, förstärkta av AI, data och automation.**

title: Testare/Testledare till Borlänge
description:
**At Sogeti, we believe the best is inside every one of us. Whether you are early in your career or at the top of your game, we’ll encourage you to fulfill your potential to be better. Through our shared passion for technology, our entrepreneurial culture , and our focus on continuous learning, we’ll provide everything you need to do your best work and become the best you can be.**

**Testare/Testledare till Borlänge**
------------------------------------

  

**Din roll**

**Som testledare kommer du arbeta med både strategiska samt operativa frågeställningar kring testbarhet i systemutvecklingen. Du behöver kunna förstå helheten kring vilka intressenter som är i behov av vilken typ av information och hur denna kan nå intressenterna som mest resurseffektivt. Till din hjälp i din verktygslåda finns vårt strukturkapital tmap.net som hjälper dig att ställa rätt frågor vid rätt tidpunkt, exempelvis kopplat till automation, testmiljöer och data. Med rätt förutsättningar kommer du tillsammans med hela utvecklingsteamet skapa en enhetlig trygghet i att leverera värde till våra slutanvändare.**

**Som testare kommer du att arbeta som en digital utredare med frågeställningar kopplade till systemets förmåga att leverera värde. Du kommer att analysera underlag, utföra tester på systemet vi utvecklar samt förmedla information i syfte att erbjuda förståelse för systemets beteende så att människor kan ta evidensbaserade beslut. Du kommer säkerligen jobba med att förstärka din förmåga att utföra ditt arbete med hjälp av automation i alla dess former.**  



**I denna roll kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i:**  

* **Nära samarbete med agila team för att utnyttja nya trender och teknologier.**
* **Snabb identifiering, utveckling och leverans av banbrytande IT-lösningar.**
* **Fokus på kvalitet i alla aspekter av arbetet.**
* **Användning av teknik för att hjälpa organisationen att nå sin fulla potential.**
**Din profil**  

* **Flera års dokumenterad erfarenhet av testning/testledning**
* **Teknisk eftergymnasial utbildning eller motsvarande**
* **Stort intresse för kvalitetssäkring**
* **Förmåga att se helhetsbilden**
* **Samarbetsförmåga**
* **Flytande i svenska (tal och skrift)**
**Meriterande kvalifikationer**  

* **ISTQB-certifiering**
* **Erfarenhet av automatiserad testning, Selenium, Playright, SQL**
* **Intresse och förståelse för systemutveckling**

  

  

**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas:**  

  

**Innovativ miljö:** **Hos oss får du chansen att jobba med den senaste tekniken och vara en del av ett dynamiskt team som älskar att skapa värde genom innovation.**  

  

**Karriärutveckling:** **Vi bryr oss om din framtid och erbjuder utvecklingsprogram och certifieringar i de senaste teknologierna, så att du kan växa och bli den bästa versionen av dig själv.**  

  

**Flexibelt arbete:** **Vi förstår att livet är mer än bara jobb. Därför erbjuder vi möjligheter till distansarbete och flexibla arbetstider för att du ska må bra och trivas.**  

  

**Teamkänsla:** **Vi är som en stor familj med en härlig teamkänsla. Genom att leva efter våra värdeord som mod, passion, laganda och entreprenörskap - skapar vi en arbetsmiljö där alla kan trivas.**  

**Ansökan**  

**Varmt välkommen med din ansökan idag, urval sker löpande! Hoppas vi ses! Vill du veta mer? Kontakta** **Sofia Wikblom på 076-119 69 92** **så berättar hon gärna mer.**

**Part of the Capgemini Group, Sogeti makes business value through technology for organizations that need to implement innovation at speed and want a local partner with global scale. With a hands-on culture and close proximity to its clients, Sogeti implements solutions that will help organizations work faster, better, and smarter. By combining its agility and speed of implementation through a DevOps approach, Sogeti delivers innovative solutions in quality engineering, cloud and application development, all driven by AI, data and automation.**

title: Teknisk Testledare, Sogeti Stockholm
description:
**At Sogeti, we believe the best is inside every one of us. Whether you are early in your career or at the top of your game, we’ll encourage you to fulfill your potential to be better. Through our shared passion for technology, our entrepreneurial culture , and our focus on continuous learning, we’ll provide everything you need to do your best work and become the best you can be.**

**Teknisk Testledare till Sogeti Stockholm**
--------------------------------------------

**Din roll:**

**Vi söker nu testledare till Sogeti Stockholm! Vill du leda testverksamhet och utvecklas som människa så är detta rollen för dig! Att vara bäst på test är helt enkelt en passion för oss. För vad är ett nytt system eller ny applikation som inte fungerar som den ska? Våra testares ögon på allt vi levererar är verksamhetskritiskt, både för våra kunder och oss. Vår expertis inom test och kvalitetssäkring är en källa till stolthet. Vi har varit med och utvecklat metoder, tekniker och processer för effektiv testning och kvalitetssäkring i över 20 år. Som testexperter är vi en otroligt viktig del av våra kunders digitala transformation.**

**I denna roll kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i:**

* **Leda testverksamhet och säkerställa kvaliteten på levererade system och applikationer.**
* **Utveckla och implementera teststrategier och processer.**
* **Samarbeta med kunder och team för att förstå och lösa deras testbehov.**
* **Bidra till förbättringsarbete av agila teamleveranser och testautomatisering.**

**Din profil:**

* **Tidigare erfarenheter inom test eller testledning.**
* **Erfarenhet av förändrings- och/eller förbättringsarbete av agila teamleveranser.**
* **Hantering och/eller implementering av testautomatisering.**
* **Erfarenhet från ett eller flera automatiseringsverktyg såsom Selenium, Tosca & Robot Framework.**
* **Kunskap inom API-testning såsom Postman, SoapUI, ReadyAPI.**
* **God kännedom om testmetoder, processer och verktyg som finns på marknaden och trivs med att göra genomlysningar och komma med rekommendationer såväl som att coacha våra kunder i framtagandet av teststrategier.**
* **Meriterande om du är certifierad inom ISTQB eller SAFe.**
* **Flytande i svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift.**

**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas:**

* **Innovativ miljö: Hos oss får du chansen att jobba med den senaste tekniken och vara en del av ett dynamiskt team som älskar att skapa värde genom innovation.**
* **Karriärutveckling: Vi bryr oss om din framtid och erbjuder utvecklingsprogram och certifieringar i de senaste teknologierna, så att du kan växa och bli den bästa versionen av dig själv.**
* **Flexibelt arbete: Vi förstår att livet är mer än bara jobb. Därför erbjuder vi möjligheter till distansarbete och flexibla arbetstider för att du ska må bra och trivas.**
* **Teamkänsla: Vi är som en stor familj med en härlig teamkänsla. Genom att leva efter våra värdeord som mod, passion, laganda och entreprenörskap - skapar vi en arbetsmiljö där alla kan trivas.**

**Ansökan:**

**Vi välkomnar varmt din ansökan idag, urvalet sker löpande! Om du har frågor om tjänsten eller rekryteringsprocessen, vänligen kontakta Team Manager, Maria Mosesson på maria.mosesson@sogeti.se**

**Part of the Capgemini Group, Sogeti makes business value through technology for organizations that need to implement innovation at speed and want a local partner with global scale. With a hands-on culture and close proximity to its clients, Sogeti implements solutions that will help organizations work faster, better, and smarter. By combining its agility and speed of implementation through a DevOps approach, Sogeti delivers innovative solutions in quality engineering, cloud and application development, all driven by AI, data and automation.**

**BA/Projektledare till Sogeti Skövde**
---------------------------------------

**Som projektledare/BA till Sogeti Skövde kommer du att arbeta med våra kunders projekt och kravställan. Du kommer att arbeta i komplexa miljöer och driva IT-projekt och BA framåt tillsammans med utvecklare, testare och arkitekter. Har du dessutom erfarenhet ifrån tillverkningsindustrin ses det som meriterande.**

**I denna roll kommer du** **bland** **mycket annat att jobba med:**

* **Kravarbete inom komplexa och större organisationer**
* **Projektleda olika IT-relaterade projekt**
* **Leda workshops**
* **Modernisera kravinsamling och hantera detta.**
* **Stakeholder management**

* **Mångårig erfarenhet av kravarbete inom IT-lösningar i stora komplexa organisationer.**
* **Erfarenhet av att leda workshops och moderera kravinsamling.**
* **Förmåga att dokumentera funktionella krav utifrån verksamhetens behov.**
* **Förmåga att presentera och diskutera olika lösningsförslag.**
* **En god förmåga att sätta sig in i kundens affär och vad som behövs för att utveckla den**

title: AI Expert
description:
**At Sogeti, we believe the best is inside every one of us. Whether you are early in your career or at the top of your game, we’ll encourage you to fulfill your potential to be better. Through our shared passion for technology, our entrepreneurial culture , and our focus on continuous learning, we’ll provide everything you need to do your best work and become the best you can be.**

**AI Expert**
-------------

**Är du redo att forma framtiden genom att omvandla information till värde?**

**Sogeti strävar efter att hjälpa våra kunder genom både strategiska och operativa förbättringar. Vi tror på att utmana befintliga lösningar för att göra dem effektivare och att använda de senaste teknologierna för att skapa värde genom moderna tillämpningar som GenAI.**

**Din roll:**

**Sogeti söker AI-experter som vill vara med och driva området i Stockholm i samarbete med kollegor i övriga landet och världen. Vi söker dig som är nyfiken, tekniskt skicklig och driven att förbättra och effektivisera verksamheter. Vi vill att du ska vara en lagspelare som är bra på att arbeta i team men även på att leverera på egen hand. Du är utåtriktad och gillar att hålla dig uppdaterad om de senaste teknologierna. Att hjälpa kunder att identifiera användningsfall och skapa största möjliga värde är något du brinner för.**

**I denna roll kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i:**

* **Tillämpa stora språkmodeller (LLM) på specifika affärsproblem för att extrahera, bearbeta, klassificera och härleda insikter från ostrukturerade datamängder.**
* **Utveckla domän- eller uppgiftsspecifika språkmodeller för affärsproblem när befintliga modeller inte kan användas.**
* **Utvärdera prestandan för maskininlärningsmodeller och ge rekommendationer för förbättringar.**
* **Hålla dig uppdaterad kring kärnteknologier inom NLP och generativ AI.**
* **Arbeta i tvärfunktionella team och ta gemensamt ägarskap och ansvar för planering, arbete, kvalitet och leverans.**
* **Agera mentor till juniora teammedlemmar för att bidra till en miljö där de får utvecklas genom stöd och support.**

**Din profil:**

* **Akademisk examen inom Data Science, Data, Machine Learning, Theoretical Linguistics eller motsvarande.**
* **Praktisk erfarenhet av stora språkmodeller (GPT, XLNet, T5, etc.).**
* **God erfarenhet av att använda moderna NLP-verktyg och bibliotek som spaCy, Hugging Face Transformers.**
* **Goda kunskaper i Python-utveckling inklusive bibliotek som NumPy, SciPy och erfarenhet av SQL.**
* **Duktig på att kommunicera och lära ut, förmåga att förklara tekniska koncept för icke-tekniska intressenter.**
* **Flytande i svenska och engelska, både skriftligt och muntligt.**
* **Praktisk erfarenhet av att arbeta med både on-prem och molnplattformar, MS Azure är meriterande.**
* **Kunskap och erfarenhet av vektordatabaser som Pinecone, Milvus eller Weaviate är meriterande.**

**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas:**

* **Innovativ miljö: Hos oss får du chansen att jobba med den senaste tekniken och vara en del av ett dynamiskt team som älskar att skapa värde genom innovation.**
* **Karriärutveckling: Vi bryr oss om din framtid och erbjuder utvecklingsprogram och certifieringar i de senaste teknologierna, så att du kan växa och bli den bästa versionen av dig själv.**
* **Flexibelt arbete: Vi förstår att livet är mer än bara jobb. Därför erbjuder vi möjligheter till distansarbete och flexibla arbetstider för att du ska må bra och trivas.**
* **Teamkänsla: Vi är som en stor familj med en härlig teamkänsla. Genom att leva efter våra värdeord som mod, passion, laganda och entreprenörskap - skapar vi en arbetsmiljö där alla kan trivas.**

**Ansökan:**

**Vi välkomnar varmt din ansökan idag, urvalet sker löpande! Om du har frågor om tjänsten eller rekryteringsprocessen, vänligen kontakta Team Manager, Johan Alsén på mejl: johan@alsen@sogeti.se**

**Part of the Capgemini Group, Sogeti makes business value through technology for organizations that need to implement innovation at speed and want a local partner with global scale. With a hands-on culture and close proximity to its clients, Sogeti implements solutions that will help organizations work faster, better, and smarter. By combining its agility and speed of implementation through a DevOps approach, Sogeti delivers innovative solutions in quality engineering, cloud and application development, all driven by AI, data and automation.**

title: Automationstestare
description:
**At Sogeti, we believe the best is inside every one of us. Whether you are early in your career or at the top of your game, we’ll encourage you to fulfill your potential to be better. Through our shared passion for technology, our entrepreneurial culture , and our focus on continuous learning, we’ll provide everything you need to do your best work and become the best you can be.**

**Automationstestare**
----------------------

**Din roll**

**Sedan många år har Sogeti placerat sig i toppen på världskartan när det gäller test och kvalitetssäkring. Att vara bäst på test är helt enkelt en passion för oss. För vad är ett nytt system eller ny applikation som inte fungerar som den ska? Våra testares ögon på allt vi levererar är verksamhetskritiskt, både för våra kunder och oss. Vår expertis inom test och kvalitetssäkring är en källa till stolthet.**

**I denna roll kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i:**

* **Arbeta utifrån olika testfall och skriva automattester.**
* **Jobba med både Sogetikollegor, branschkollegor och representanter från kund.**
* **Utföra test i såväl mjukvara som labbmiljö.**
* **Utmana och testa system, felsöka och arbeta tillsammans i team.**

**Din profil**

* **Teknisk eftergymnasial utbildning.**
* **Stort intresse och förståelse för produktutveckling samt test och kvalitetssäkring.**
* **Stort intresse för teknik (gärna med inriktning mot fordon, men inget måste).**
* **Erfarenhet av skriptspråk.**
* **Flytande i svenska (tal & skrift) samt goda kunskaper i engelska.**
* **Svenskt/EU Schengen medborgarskap.**

title: Systems Engineer
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 We're evolving our data center environments into a consumption-based Private Cloud, delivering world class Hybrid Cloud to our internal and external customers. To support this transformation, we're looking for a hands-on Systems Engineer to join our Private Cloud Infrastructure Team in Stockholm, Sweden (hybrid role).
   

  

 As a Systems Engineer, you'll play a vital role in designing, deploying, migrating, and maintaining key infrastructure components, including AWS, VMWare, HPE, VMAX, SAN (primarily Brocade), RHEL and Windows AD, all while ensuring 99.999% uptime. Once our technology refresh is complete, you'll help shape our private cloud landscape, in Kubernetes and other emerging technologies. You'll also represent the Private Cloud team as an SME, collaborating with application teams, developers, DevOps, and stakeholders.
   

  

* Manage and maintain Linux and Windows systems, ensuring security, performance, and reliability.
* Oversee virtualization platforms (VMware ESXi, vCenter) and public cloud environments.
* Administer SAN and NAS Storage, including Fiber Channel SAN switching.
* Maintain Servers, operating systems, and storage across global data centers.
* Design, deploy, and maintain end-to-end infrastructure monitoring solutions.
* Automate and configure systems with Ansible and SaltStack.
* Provide Tier-3/4 on-call support for production infrastructure and fault management on a rotating 24/7 schedule.
* Design, plan, and implement systems security infrastructure.
* Support compliance efforts for ISO 27001 certification.


**Requirements**
 We believe you're proactive, structured, and methodical in your approach to work. You communicate effectively, value documentation and planning, and thrive in collaborative environments and balance independent initiative with strong teamwork. Problem-solving comes naturally to you and you can adapt quickly to deliver secure, resilient, and scalable, quality solutions to the dynamic and rapidly evolving IT landscape and associated technologies.
   

  

* Hands-on experience in Linux server administration.
* Strong VMware administration skills in Private Cloud environment, as well as infrastructure maintenance.
* Expertise in SAN storage systems and NAS storage administration, including SAN switching, zoning, and LUN creation/presentation.
* Experience with automation tools such as Ansible, SaltStack, Python, or PowerShell.
* Good knowledge with Prometheus, Grafana, and AlertManager or similar monitoring platform.
* Networking experience, including TCP/IP, OS network stacks, bonding/teaming, IP Tables, network virtualization, LAN switching, and end-to-end client-server communication models.
* Design and deployment experience with Docker and/or Kubernetes is a plus.
* Cloud platform experience (AWS, Azure, or GCP) is a plus.
* Knowledge of ITIL and change management best practices.


 Our corporate language is English, please submit your application in
 **English** 
 .
   

  

****OUR HIRING PROCESS****
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Cloud DevSecOps Engineer
description:
**Introducing evroc**
 At evroc, we are building a secure, sovereign, and sustainable hyperscale cloud to reimagine the digital future of Europe. By joining our company, you have an exciting opportunity to contribute to the development of next-generation cloud services. We are seeking intellectually curious and highly motivated team members who are ready to embrace the thrilling challenge of building the first European owned hyperscale cloud.
   

  

**Location:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Job type:** 
 Permanent position
   

  

**The Role**
 We are looking for an experienced Cloud DevSecOps Engineer to enhance our cloud security and vulnerability team. You will focus on proactive security research, developing security tools, conducting assessments, and assisting development teams with secure code reviews. Deep knowledge of cloud security models and a proven track record of successful incident resolution are essential for this role.
   

  

**What You’ll Tackle**
* Implement and manage security monitoring tools to detect real-time threats in cloud environments.
* Collaborate with cloud engineering teams to integrate security best practices into CI/CD pipelines.
* Conduct regular security assessments on cloud infrastructure to address vulnerabilities.
* Develop and maintain cloud security policies, ensuring compliance with standards like ISO 27001, PCI DSS, and GDPR.
* Monitor and respond to security alerts and incidents, mitigating risks promptly.
* Design and implement incident response plans for cloud-based security breaches.
* Stay up to date with cloud security trends and technologies to enhance the organization’s security posture.


**Skills We Value**
* Typically 5+ years of hands-on experience in platform and cloud security.
* Strong knowledge of GCP, Azure, AWS, containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes), and cloud infrastructure security.
* Advanced C, C++, Golang or Rust (Linux and systems-level) programming skills and secure coding practices.
* Experience with networks, system security, IAM, encryption, firewalls, SIEM tools, vulnerability scanners, and Terraform.
* Certifications such as CISSP, CISM, CEH, or CompTIA Security+ are advantageous.
* Excellent communicator who collaborates effectively with cross-functional teams, including remote colleagues. We value individuals who demonstrate strong leadership and initiative, with the ability to take ownership of security projects independently.


 We offer a competitive salary and an equity package to attract the best. Whether it’s the cosmopolitan allure of London, the vibrant Stockholm, or the Mediterranean charm of Sophia Antipolis, you’re poised for an inspiring work environment and a captivating local culture!
   

  

 At evroc, diversity is our strength. We champion an inclusive environment where every background - ethnicity, age, gender identity, beliefs, and culture - is celebrated.
   

  

 Applicants must possess a valid work permit.

title: Platform Engineer
company_industry: Information Services and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
Why Lovable?
   

  

* Change the world, literally: 2025 is the year AI works, and Lovable has the best AI full stack engineer product (According to industry veterans)
* Work, learn, have fun: We're building the strongest technical team in Europe. You will shape our culture and be inspired in a place of exceptional talent density
* Build a unique network: Lovable is a global top AI brand that the world is eager to work with. You will meet and work with some of the most important people in tech
* Get autonomy & ownership: With lots of things being built, this is a unique opportunity to get ownership and have a true impact on our product
* Compensation: Lovable pays top of market cash and equity, and is committed to compensate better than any other company in Sweden on a performance basis


 What we're looking for
   

  

* You're obsessed with building systems that scale beautifully and have built infra that handles massive, unpredictable load
* Deep experience with Rust, Terraform, and Kubernetes (or alternatives like Nomad) for infrastructure engineering
* You geek out about container isolation and microVM management (e.g., Firecracker)
* You have strong opinions about security and aren't afraid to enforce them


 Your responsibilities
   

  

* Design, manage, and optimize our microVM sandbox infrastructure built with Rust, Firecracker, and other state-of-the-art technologies
* Create infrastructure so reliable, devs forget it exists (and that can scale from 0 to infinity)
* Make our microVMs boot faster than you can blink
* Build security so tight that even paranoid developers trust it
* Create self-healing infrastructure that fixes problems before they happen
* Make infrastructure decisions that won't come back to haunt us
* This is an in-office role (5 days a week)


 Our tech stack
   

  

 We're building with tools that both humans and AI love:
   

  

* Frontend: React for lightning-fast interfaces
* Backend: Golang and Rust for serious performance
* Cloud: Cloudflare, Fly.io, Google Cloud Run, AWS, Terraform
* And always exploring what's next


 How applying works
   

  

* Fill in a short form then jump on an initial exploratory call.
* We'll send you a quick take-home for (1) a written case study and (2) a loom video presentation
* Join us for a round of interviews
* If possible, join us for a week of (paid) trial work. We'll see how you tick and you get to meet the team & explore whether joining Lovable feels right for you

title: Engineering Manager
description:
Trustly is leading the human-centric payments revolution. To us, this means passionately building the most convenient, intelligent and responsible way of paying for things online. Whether it’s for shopping, paying subscriptions, funding trading accounts, booking airfare, playing online games and much more – we’re all about a better way to pay. At our core, we are a tech company with industry-leading tech capabilities. But, it’s the ingenuity of our people that makes us leaders in our field. Thus, our appetite for innovation will never be anything less than fierce. Trustly is steadily growing as it connects thousands of businesses with hundreds of millions of people. And with a strong presence across Europe and the Americas, we are leading the human-centric payment revolution as a truly global team.
 




  





**About the Product & Tech Organisation
 





 Our Product & Technology organisation drives the development of Trustly’s products. The cross functional teams collectively work with innovative ideas, development of products and platform and set the vision and strategy for the problem spaces they own. The Product & Tech organisation consists of a bit more than 200 people spread across Stockholm, Lisbon, Örebro, Paris, London and Izmir. 
 









 All teams consist of a product manager, an engineering manager, a lead developer and engineers. Some teams also have designers and analytics competence in the team. They all work closely together to enable new products and features within existing products within Europe and to make sure the payment platform runs without interruptions and with high performance.
 









 We are now looking to strengthen our engineering capacity within Product & Technology with one more senior position. We operate in an agile culture combined with DevOps, allowing our teams to take on full responsibility from code to on-call.
 








**About the Role
 





 As an
 
**Engineering Manager
 
 at Trustly, you will play a crucial role in leading and supporting an agile team of talented engineers. Working closely with product managers, lead developers, and other stakeholders, you’ll ensure delivery of high-quality, scalable, and reliable systems while fostering a positive and empowering team culture. This is an excellent opportunity to bridge technical excellence and people management, delivering real impact in the payments industry.
 


  




**What you'll do** 
* **Team Leadership** 
 : Lead, coach, and support a team of engineers, enabling them to perform at their best while fostering a culture of collaboration, ownership, and continuous learning
* **Delivery Excellence** 
 : Drive successful delivery of the team’s commitments, ensuring alignment with domain objectives and product goals
* **Technical Collaboration** 
 : Work hands-on with lead developers and engineers to design, implement, and maintain scalable systems and solutions aligned with Trustly’s technical standards
* **Product Partnership** 
 : Work closely with the product manager to define and prioritise the team’s roadmap, balancing short-term goals with long-term vision
* **Operational Ownership** 
 : Ensure your team’s systems operate reliably in production, with high performance, availability, and maintainability
* **Talent Development** 
 : Recruit, onboard, and mentor engineers, creating an environment where they can grow and thrive
* **Process Improvement** 
 : Advocate for and implement best practices in agile methodologies, DevOps, and engineering processes to continuously improve team effectiveness



  




**Who you are** 
* Proven experience managing engineering teams in agile environments, with a strong focus on team empowerment and delivery
* Hands-on engineering background with expertise in Java and experience in building scalable, robust systems
* Familiarity with modern tech stacks including Kubernetes, Docker, Kafka, and Spring Boot
* Experience working with cloud solutions (preferably AWS), monitoring, and analytics
* Knowledge of service-based architecture and microservices
* Strong ability to balance technical decisions with business needs, ensuring delivery without sacrificing scalability, performance, or reliability
* Committed to fostering a culture of collaboration, innovation, and excellence
* Passion for DevOps practices and ownership, with a track record of driving improvements in automation and monitoring
* Exceptional communication, problem-solving, and leadership skills
* Fluent in English



  




**At Trustly, you’ll have the opportunity to:** 
* Shape the future of payments as part of a global leader in the industry
* Work with cutting-edge technology and highly skilled colleagues in an agile and collaborative environment
* Take on a role with real impact, where your contributions directly drive the success of your team and Trustly’s mission
* Enjoy a supportive and dynamic culture that encourages growth, innovation, and ownership






  




  


**Our Fantastic Benefits**




 🌴
 **20 to 30 days of holiday** 
 (depending on location) to support a healthy work-life balance
 



 🥳
 **Monthly team outing allowance** 
 to enjoy social events with your colleagues
 



 👶
 **Parental leave top-up** 
 additional support for new parents
 



 🥐
 **Daily breakfast and on-site perks** 
 to make your workday smoother
 



 💚
 **Well being support** 
 our health allowance covers gym memberships, massages, and much more to help you feel your best
 



**PLUS** 
 additional benefits designed to enhance your work-life experience!
 







**Shape Your Role and Make an Impact**




 Join a dynamic environment where you can take ownership, drive change, and continuously embrace new challenges. We’re looking for dedicated and highly motivated individuals who thrive in a fast-paced environment and enjoy collaborating across different areas of the organisation.
 



 If your skills and experience align with this role, we’d love to hear from you!
 **Apply now and submit your CV in English.********

title: System Engineer – Electronic Warfare
description:
**🚀 Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a 🚀
   

  

 Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our**
**About VIPAS**
 Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.
   

  

**Job Description**
 Are you passionate about cutting-edge technology and national defense? We're looking for an experienced
 **System Engineer** 
 to join our client's advanced Electronic Warfare team in
 **Linköping** 
 . You’ll be working with technology that protects fighter aircraft by detecting and neutralizing threats.
   

  

 This is a high-impact role where you’ll be involved in the full development lifecycle—from requirements and design to implementation and testing using simulators and rigs.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Develop, implement, and test Electronic Warfare systems for fighter aircraft (e.g., radar warning receivers, electronic countermeasures)
* Participate in agile scrum teams with opportunities to specialize in system, software, hardware, or embedded development
* Collaborate in a multidisciplinary engineering environment using modern tools and methodologies


**Requirements**
* 3–8+ years of experience in system, software, hardware, or embedded development
* Proficiency in C++ (Gripen EF) or Pascal (Gripen CD)
* Familiarity with tools like CLion, Git, and third-party software
* Swedish proficiency


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience testing in simulators and hardware rigs
* Knowledge of aeronautical engineering and defense systems


**Why Join Us?**
 Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
   

  

 You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!
   

  

 Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at swathianantu@vipas.se
   

  

 Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.
   

  

**How To Apply**
 Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!
   

  

 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Snr Infrastructure Cloud Architect, Professional Services
description:
**Description**
 The Amazon Web Services Professional Services (ProServe) team is seeking an experienced ProServe Cloud Architect (PCA) to join our team at Amazon Web Services (AWS). In this role, you'll work closely with customers to understand their technical requirements and business objectives, designing and implementing tailored cloud solutions. You'll be a key player in the pre-sales process, providing technical expertise and guidance throughout the customer's cloud journey.
   

  

 In this role, you'll be responsible for creating and leading the solution design to address customer business outcomes (CBO). Operating as the conduit between ProServe Account Executives and our Shared Delivery Teams (SDT), you’ll ensure proposed solutions are realistic, achievable, and optimize ProServe and/or our partners to maximize CBOs. As a PCA you are a trusted advisor to our customers, providing guidance on industry trends, emerging technologies, and innovative solutions to address customer challenges. As a technical SME, you will share knowledge within the organization, through mentoring, training, creation of reusable artifacts and process improvements.
   

  

 Your experience in designing technical solutions within the technology/consulting sector, will equip you with the ability to architect complex, scalable, and secure solutions tailored to meet the specific needs of each customer, translating technical concepts into business value. Your success as a PCA will be linked to impacting the signing of SOWs, and the successful implementation of solutions which achieve CBOs while exceeding customer satisfaction (CSAT) expectations.
   

  

 The AWS Professional Services organization is a global team of experts that help customers realize their desired business outcomes when using the AWS Cloud. We work together with customer teams and the AWS Partner Network (APN) to execute enterprise cloud computing initiatives. Our team provides assistance through a collection of offerings which help customers achieve specific outcomes related to enterprise cloud adoption. We also deliver focused guidance through our global specialty practices, which cover a variety of solutions, technologies, and industries.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

 As an experienced technology professional, you will be responsible for:
   

  

* Designing complex, scalable, and secure AWS solutions to deliver customer business outcomes (CBOs)
* Providing technical guidance and best practices during pre-sales and implementation phases
* Collaborating with Account Managers and Shared Delivery Teams to ensure proposed solutions are realistic and achievable
* Acting as a trusted advisor to customers on industry trends and emerging technologies
* Sharing knowledge within the organization through mentoring, training, and creating reusable artifacts


**About The Team**
 Diverse Experiences: AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job below, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS? Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture - Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship & Career Growth - We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance - We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Experience in cloud architecture, including designing and implementing cloud solutions.
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, related field, or equivalent experience
* Hands-on programming/scripting experience to drive the design, development and deployment of business software infrastructure at scale


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Advanced technology degree or AWS Professional level certifications (e.g., Solutions Architect Professional, DevOps Engineer Professional) preferred
* Deep understanding of AWS services across compute, storage, networking, security, databases, machine learning, and serverless technologies
* Knowledge of security and compliance standards (e.g., HIPAA, GDPR)
* Expertise in performance optimization and cost management for cloud environments
* Strong communication skills with the ability to explain technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences as part of pre-sales motion


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

 Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - AWS EMEA SARL (Sweden Branch)
   

  

 Job ID: A2947370

title: Genesys Cloud  Developer - TD0704
description:
• Responsible for constructing flows using Architect (Call, Email, Chat, Message, Survey, Voice Mail, In-Queue, etc.) & IVR development.
 



 • Candidate should have depth of technical knowledge and experience architecting and delivering IVR and bots (Genesys and 3rd party bot platform such as Google Dialog flow, Amazon Lex, etc.).
 



 • Experience with Genesys APIs and integration with 3rd party solutions and CRMs (e.g. Salesforce)
 



 • Genesys cloud CX certified developer and architect certification will be a plus point.
 



 • Work independently on design, develop and maintain IVRs, Bots and routing applications for DTMF and speech interaction.
 



 • Experience in WFM configuration, forecasting and scheduling.
 



 • Identify and Interface with required teams, OEMs, Vendors to achieve desirable goals for the function and people.
 



 • The Genesys Cloud Senior Developer would need to have at least 8-10 years of experience.
 



 • This Candidate will design, build, test and implement new features and functionality for global Interactive Voice Response (IVR) systems which run on the Genesys Cloud.
 



 • Experience in the Contact Center business using a Genesys Cloud solution containing voice,
 



 • Experience in software development for Contact Center using languages: Java, C#, JavaScript, VXML, GRXML and Python.
 



 • Proven experience in developing IVR with DTMF and voice recognition navigation.
 



 • Experience in implementing Genesys Cloud Contact Center projects in the public cloud.
 



 • Expertise on Call Flow Design,Web Services Integration (3rd party)
 



 • Experience with Genesys APIs and integration with 3rd party solutions and CRM’s.
 



 • Genesys Cloud Scripts and Screen pop
 



 • Genesys Cloud WFM configuration, forecast and scheduling.
